that is exciting! what kind of car?
it was a mustang. i saved up enough money and purchased it outright
label: excited
response: wow, that is impressive. i have always liked mustangs. what color?

situation: my cat jumped on me while i was sleeping.
dialogue: i was fast asleep this morning when my cat pounced on me and jolted me awake.
i have had pets to do that too.
it came out of nowhere. i almost fell out of bed!
label: surprised
response: well, i guess it really loves you.

situation: i really miss the old days when i lived in california by the ocean. in the evening we would take the dog and some wine to the beach and catch the sunset. gosh, i really miss those times.
dialogue: i am feeling a little down right now. the weather is perfect, but i miss not going to the beach with my husband and dog and catching the sunset. those were great times!
i bet!  i am sorry you are feeling down.
yeah, we would take a bottle of wine with us, watch the surfers and just kick back. wish those days would return.
label: nostalgic
response: times like that would be so awesome! i hope they come back for you

situation: i am confident that i will win that spelling bee tomorrow
dialogue: i am confident that i will win that spelling bee tomorrow
a spelling bee what fun! i am sure you will win i bet you've worked hard toward your goal.
i have. i have studied for 3 week now
label: confident
response: that is a lot of studying. well, the best of luck to you, though i know you will not need it after all that hard work!

situation: my youngest daughter is being potty trained.  yesterday she decided she did not want to be called a baby and got on the toilet by herself.
dialogue: i have been trying lately to potty train my youngest daughter.
how is it going?
it is been a challenge.  yesterday she got on the toilet herself though.  she said she did not want to be a baby anymore.
label: proud
response: that is one way to get them. being a "big girl" is such an accomplishment

situation: my wife has been out of the country for a couple months for school.  dropping her off at the airport was really tough.
dialogue: my wife has been out of the country for school for a while.  dropping her off at the airport was really hard.
do you guys get to talk a lot?
yeah, we talk by text all the time and call every day.  it is still hard though, we have not been apart longer than a couple days since we met.
label: sad
response: getting through it can only make your relationshipi stronger though

situation: i was sad when my dog died
dialogue: i was sad when my dog died
i am sorry to hear that.
its ok. it is just been rough without him. i miss him
label: sad
response: was he sick before?

situation: my wife is coming back home after being out of the country for 2 months.
dialogue: my wife is coming home after being out of the country for 2 months.  i cannot wait!
you must be really excited!
i am!  we have never been apart this long, so it is been tough.
label: excited
response: are you planning something special when she comes home?

situation: i was afraid when i watched a horror film
dialogue: i was afraid when i watched a horror film
i am sorry to hear that, they frighten me as well.
some have pop ups and they are creepy
label: afraid
response: yes, those scare me to death when they come out of nowhere.

situation: i am going on vacation! i have not been on vacation in years!
dialogue: i am going on vacation for the first time in several years!
great, where will you be going?
i am taking a cruise to alaska. i am so excited.
label: excited
response: well, that will be fantastic. hope you have a good time.

situation: i am waiting anxiously until the end of the week, when i am going to pick up my wife from her flight back home after 2 months.
dialogue: my wife is coming back into the country at the end of the weeks after 2 months away.  i cannot wait!
cool beans. where was she?
germany for a language course.
label: anticipating
response: did you get to visit? germany is quite beautiful.

situation: i was prepared for tonights big dinner
dialogue: i was prepared for tonights big dinner
where is it gonna be at?
it is going to be at my house. we are going to have a lot of food
label: prepared
response: is someone important coming voer?

situation: i was terrified when i watched that horror movie
dialogue: i was terrified when i watched that horror movie
which one was it
it was scream
label: terrified
response: it was not that scary to me

situation: i found letters that my wife wrote me when we first dating. they gave me all of the feels.
dialogue: i was digging through some old stuff i had and i found letters that my wife wrote me when we were still dating. they were so sweet.
aww. that is nnice
yeah! it gave me all of the feels. i read through them and pretty much fell in love with her all over again.
label: sentimental
response: no one writes letters anymore.. its kind of sad

situation: i managed to spook myself in college by watching a little too much horror while living alone.
dialogue: i managed to spook myself really bad once watching too many horror movies and being in a house alone by the woods.
that would definitely creep me out.
yeah.  i kept thinking trees were people or things standing out in the woods.
label: afraid
response: i have done that before

situation: i am so proud of my wife
dialogue: i am so proud of my wife
i bet she is a wonderful woman
she really is
label: proud
response: hold on to her

situation: i was angry when my son destroyed my car
dialogue: i was angry when my son destroyed my car
oh no is it completely destroyed not salvagable ?
no not salvagable. i had to buy a new one.
label: angry
response: so sorry to hear about this disaster

situation: i am starting a new job next week, and i am super nervous.
dialogue: i am starting a new job next week, and while i am excited, i am also very nervous!
congratulations!  do not be too nervous!  you must have done something right to get the job in the first place!
that is true, but the uncertainty always makes me feel a bit nervous.
label: anxious
response: that is natural.  i am sure you will do great!

situation: i left my dogs in the care of a friend while i went out of town for a weekend.
dialogue: i had to go out of town and leave my dogs with a friend, i was worried about them.
did everything go okay?
yeah.  they annoyed my friend some, but overall it was fine.
label: trusting
response: well that is good.

situation: my wife has been out of the country for 2 months.
dialogue: my wife has been in germany for 2 months.  i cannot wait till she gets home.
wow, i bet you miss her so much. my wife is going overseas with our son and they will be gone for 1 month! i know i will be miserable without them
it sucks, but it is best to keep busy with whatever you can.  videogames helped a lot :p
label: lonely
response: i will play pubg after work to keep me busy

situation: my wife went out of the country for 2 months, it is almost over but it is been tough.
dialogue: my wife has been out of the country for 2 months.  she is coming back soon, but it is been tough without her.
well it will be over soon
i am looking forward to it
label: lonely
response: i bet you are. i definitely woudl be

situation: i am getting cold feet about moving to another city.
dialogue: i am planning on moving to a new city, but i am starting to get cold feet.
what has you so nervous?
i am just unsure about the city.like what if i am miserable there?
label: apprehensive
response: have you considered taking a weekend trip there to see how you like it?

situation: i was in charge of moving a whole bunch of stuff at work from one building to another, and one of my co-workers bailed on us.
dialogue: one of the things i had to do when i started my job was be in charge of moving a department.  when we were doing it, one of my coworkers bailed on me.
did it leave you to do it alone, or were there others ?
there were others, but we needed all the help we could get.
label: angry
response: i see how that would be frustrating.

situation: everybody say a quiet place movie was boring but i was pretty impressed
dialogue: everybody say a quiet place movie was boring but i still decided to watch it and i was pretty impressed! that movie was so amazing, i feel like i was holding my breath the whole time
i have heard about this movie but i have never had a chance to watch it
omg, you should! it is a one of a kind movie. i do not wanna spoil it, it is about aliens
label: impressed
response: aliens? i did not think it was about aliens, i thought it is about ghosts and stuff

situation: close friend has an unlimited stream of money from her parents. always wishing i was able to do the stuff she does and not work.
dialogue: it sure must be nice to be able to get all the cool stuff, and do whatever you want and not have to work for any of it.
well i would not know
yeah me either. i have some friends that get to experience it. fortunately they are sharing so that is nice.
label: jealous
response: i do not have any sharing friends either. you are lucky

situation: i was disgusted when i noticed the food on the table
dialogue: i was disgusted when i noticed the food on the table
what kind of food?
it was brussel sprouts and liver
label: disgusted
response: oh, disgusting.

situation: i successfully trained my dog to behave and listen to commands. i had failed with my first dog, but in retrospect it was his breed is not very trainable.
dialogue: i have a lab mix and he is so well behaved and listens to commands so well. i am glad i got him as a puppy.
did you start training him when he was young?
oh yea. basically started the day we got him. that definitely helped.
label: proud
response: that is awesome. i love a well trained dog.

situation: my friend just recently moved to california, i have always wanted to live there
dialogue: my friend just recently moved to california.it makes me sad because i have always wanted to live there.
oh that is good for your friend, but it sounds like you really would like to live there! i can imagine feeling jealous
yeah.i really am. i have wanted to live there since i was a little girl. someday i will!
label: jealous
response: you will get there! i would just be happy and supportive of your friend and visit often!

situation: i was trying to plan my wedding by getting a caterer, and they kept blowing us off over and over again.
dialogue: when i was planning my wedding, the caterer we were trying to go with kept blowing us off and dodging communication.
oh no, did you find a backup caterer
yeah, we dropped them with enough time to find someone else, but it was unnecessary stress we did not need.
label: furious
response: of course, the wedding can be the most stressful event of your life

situation: a customer is refusing to pay a bill because they claim it has already been paid but cannot provide any proof of doing so.
dialogue: it is so frustrating having to deal with difficult customers that do not want to pay their bills/
i like to call them deadbeats
normally i would agree. it only seems to be a few here and there. most of the time i do not have problems.
label: angry
response: what do you collect for ? credit cards or utilities ?

situation: i am going overseas in 2 weeks@
dialogue: i am going overseas in 2 weeks! i will be on vacaion for 1 months and i just can not wait@
oh i just did that recently. i just got back from 2 months. it will be a fantastic time.
where did you go?
label: anticipating
response: i went to thailand and vietnam. do not worry about anything. traveling was so easy and people are nice everywhere.

situation: i woke up in the middle of the night and looked through my doorway, which was open.  there was a sweatshirt hanging on a door, and in my sleepy daze i thought it was a real person.  i live alone so i thought it was an intruder and i just about had a heart attack. i soon realized it was just clothes hanging there, in the shape of a person.
dialogue: i just about had a figurative heart attack the other night.
what happened?
i woke up in the wee hours and thought i saw a person standing in the corner of my room.  it was just some clothes hanging on a door.
label: terrified
response: oh wow, i would of been terrified!

situation: i am very annoyed because my friend did not give me my money back
dialogue: i am very annoyed because my friend did not give me my money back
was it a large amount?
yes! it was to cover his rent and he was supposed to pay me back
label: annoyed
response: that is rough. i am sorry that must put you in a real bind.

situation: going on vacation and i am done packing 2 days before i leave. i usually scramble the night before.
dialogue: i typically procrastinate when needing to pack for a trip. but this time i got my butt in gear and it is all done several days early.
congradulations on being prepared.
thanks. i usually get somewhere and realize i forgot a bunch of stuff i need cause i packed in a rush 30 minutes before leaving.
label: prepared
response: it reallyi s the best way to do things. that way even if you forget something you've got time to remember and remedy the situation

situation: my wife took the rest of the day off to spend time with me yesterday.
dialogue: my wife was working yesterday, but she ended up taking the rest of the day off to spend time with me! i was shocked.
that sounds lovely. did yall make it a special day to remember?
we did! we went out for lunch and hung out on the beach. it was very relaxing and a nice change.
label: surprised
response: that sounds fantastic.  i am sure you guys will remember that day for a while. what a nice surprise.

situation: i went to a restaurant my wife really likes with some friends while she was at work.
dialogue: i went to a restaurant my wife really likes with some friends while she was at work.  it is not a big thing, but i felt a little bad about it :p
why you should feel bad. i am not getting you my friend
not like really bad, just kind of bad that i went somewhere my wife likes when she could not go.  it is not a big deal, but i feel bad when i do things like that.
label: guilty
response: oh. you must be sweet then. your wife is lucky

situation: that horror movie made me terrified
dialogue: that horror movie made me terrified
what movie was it ?
scream
label: terrified
response: the worst a movie has gotten me was event horizon.

situation: i really want to have another baby
dialogue: i really want to have another baby. baby fever is real i do not want to be all crazy about it, do not wanna track ovulation and do all this but i really wanna get pregnant asap
wow i did not know you can track ovulation. good luck with getting pregannt
thank you oh yeah, you can track ovulation, measure basal body temperature, etc. i am not gonna go into details
label: hopeful
response: please do not i am a man, i appreciate what you women go through when you are pregnant or on your period but i am okay with not knowing details

situation: my mom has bought me some books online.  the should be delivered today.  i am eagerly waiting for them.
dialogue: my mom bought be a book online.  it should be here today i am just waiting on the delivery man.
its the worse having to wait for something you really want.
yes it is.  she wanted two options so i would not know which she'd pick.  she picked the right one so now it is just a waiting game.
label: excited
response: oh nice. make a nice lunch to keep yourself busy. the delivery will be there in no time if you keep yourself busy.

situation: at a recent holiday my wife's family was saying things they were thankful to have an my father in law said how happy he was to have me in the family. made me feel really good about having them in my life as well.
dialogue: it is nice to have in-laws that are accepting and loving. so many people do not have a good relationship with their in-laws.
yes i agree. i did have a good relationship with my m other in law but recently it changed.
aw i am sorry. mine is only a few years old but it is been smooth sailing so far.
label: grateful
response: mine has been around 7 years and it is been a little rocky.

situation: i have been on my son to start taking a more active role everyday life stuff like mainting a sleep scedule.  after weeks of pushing the issue he still hasn't done so.
dialogue: i have been trying to get my oldest son to be more responsible.  i started out small by asking him to adopt a good sleep schedule.  after several weeks he still hasn't.
oh no. is he responsible with school or a job?
he does well enough in school.  i think that might make him think he does not need any disciple in everyday life.  make me worry a bit.
label: disappointed
response: i understand, he will learn though once he gets a job and has to pay bills that he will want to go to sleep at a decent time!

situation: i recently successfully planned a birthday party without my wife finding out. she usually finds out everything.
dialogue: my wife usually sniffs out anything going on, but i was able to successfully plan a surprise party for her without her knowing.
did you have a bunch of people show up there at the party?
yes. friends, family, cake, all of it. even one friend from out of town she hasn't seen in years.
label: proud
response: that is a great job! well done!

situation: i am so grateful for my wife
dialogue: i am so grateful for my wife
yeah, she seems like a great woman, you are lucky to have her.
she really is! i could not be where i am without her
label: grateful
response: you should take her on a vacation, or something. she deserves it.

situation: i have a huge phobia of roaches.  i can handle almost any kind of crawling or flying bug except them.
dialogue: i can handle, bees, scorpions, wasps, crickets, and spiders.  but for some reason i lose my mind around roaches.
at least you can handle those. i cannot do any of those
i take some conselation in that, however my kids laugh when they hear thier dad scream like a girl at a flying roach.
label: afraid
response: well, they would probably be the same if they were in your shoes

situation: i feel guilty because i could not go to my friends party
dialogue: i feel guilty because i could not go to my friends party
understandable.  what was the reason?
i was working and i could not leave early
label: guilty
response: did you explain it to them.  that is a pretty good reason to miss it.

situation: when i was younger my mom would always have to go on a week long training for work every year and i would always miss her so much.
dialogue: as a momma's boy i always missed my mom anytime she was gone for an extended period of time.
sure, that makes sense.
fortunately, she rarely was gone for long periods of time, but i always dreaded this once a year work training she had to do.
label: lonely
response: how is your relationship now ?

situation: i am so excited about going to the movies
dialogue: i am so excited about going to the movies
oh cool! what movie are you going to see?
i am going to see the purge. i have been waiting to see it for a while
label: excited
response: oh awesome! it is a new one?

situation: i saw a homeless lady
dialogue: i saw a homeless lady and i felt so bad for her because it was so hot outside so went to five guys and bought her some food and cold drinks
that is extremely sweet of you! you are a nice person. my wife and i made some blessing bags and we give them everytime we see homeless people
blessing bags?? what are those?
label: caring
response: basically it is a bag with necessities. we put some water, some non perishable foods, snacks, some wipes and a little bit of money

situation: i spent a while the other day framing the guest puzzle we used at our wedding as a guest book.
dialogue: the other day i framed the puzzle we used as a guest book at our wedding.
what a great idea, where did that come from?
etsy somewhere.  my wife bought it, so i do not really know which one, but you can find a bunch on there.
label: sentimental
response: well i need to keep that in mind, great suggestion

situation: i just drove from northern california to florida. i knew i could do it without a problem, and i was right. i would done it before, in the opposite direction, so i knew i was capable of making such a trip.
dialogue: well, what a trip that was. i just drove from northern california to florida. i just knew there would be no problems, and i was right.
oh wow, what a long trip. how long did it take?
six days in all, but i was not rushing it. i wanted to see a bit of the country. it was amazing actually.
label: confident
response: that is a long time to be in the car for sure.

situation: i have been making goals each week for earning money.  i am hoping to save enough to start renovations on my house.
dialogue: i have big renovation plans for my house.  i have made a money plan and have kept to it so far.
well at least you have a plan. are you planning to start the renovation soon?
yes, hopefully it will all go as planned.  so far so good.
label: hopeful
response: awesome. i am sure it is going to turn out great.

situation: i was so anxious for my kid to graduate
dialogue: i was so anxious for my kid to graduate
i can understand that. did it end up going ok?
it did. i am very proud of him
label: anxious
response: that is good. i am glad everything worked out.

situation: i did not really try to lose weight but i did by drinking smoothie
dialogue: i did not really try to use weight but i started going to the pool and i actually lost a couple of lbs
that is good to hear! good for you! maybe i should go to the pool too
it is really fun and it is also a great exercise! plus water is so relaxing
label: impressed
response: true! do you just swim or you do some water aerobics?

situation: i hope when i get older,  i am not lonely as i am now
dialogue: i hope when i get older,  i am not lonely as i am now
i am sorry to hear that. have you ever been married?
i was engaged but my woman left me
label: lonely
response: i am so sorry. it was not meant to be.

situation: i recently heard in the air tonight by phil collins.  i reminded me of my childhood back in the 80's.
dialogue: i recently heard in the air tonight by phil collins.
that is such a good tune.
yeah, for some reason it takes me back to being a kid in the 80's.  no specific memory just a general feeling.
label: nostalgic
response: yeah, it is definitely a classic. it reminds me of my childhood as well.

situation: i got upset at my oldest son because he shows such lack of motivation.  while gettting on him might have been warranted, i feel bad for getting upset.
dialogue: i got upset at my oldest son's lack of motivation.  i feel bad that i got angry with him though.
maybe you just have to find a way to get him motivated, without showing anger.
true.  i just have not found a way to yet.  need to be more creative.
label: guilty
response: yeah, just stay positive about it, i am sure you will figure something out.

situation: my husband and i went to see a house a while back, called the mansion. we went through the door and felt an icy blast like nothing i have experienced before. when i went upstairs i became terrified and ran down and out the door!
dialogue: k and i went to see a house a while ago. i do not know what happened there, but when i went upstairs i became more and more nervous and eventually ran back downstairs and out the door. scary or what.
was it just a bad feeling you had?
it was as if something was telling me to get out. k had the same feeling in the basement. i have never had that happen before.
label: afraid
response: maybe someone died there

situation: i love streaming services. however, i am annoyed by the lack of movies i want to watch without having to pay extra.
dialogue: i love streaming services but sometimes they really frustrate me.
oh yeah, the buffering?  very annoying.
every once in awhile i get the idea to search for a movie, and almost every time it is either not listed or requires an extra charge.
label: annoyed
response: i hear that.  sometimes the classics are impossible to find.

situation: my eldest niece graduated high school recently. it is absolutely wonderful as she is worked so hard to do well and she totally deserves it. she helps take care of her disabled younger sister too, which is a lot for a teenager.
dialogue: my eldest niece, who helps take care of her younger disabled sister, graduated high school with great grades recently. she works hard both at her studies and taking care of her sister she deserves it.
did you get her something special?
yes, i got her tickets for a show in london that she is been wanting to see. she lives in scotland, so the journey is not bad at all. she is taking a friend with her.
label: proud
response: oh awesome, that is great!

situation: there is a girl i like.  i want to ask her out.  if she says no i am afraid it will ruin our friendship.
dialogue: i want to ask this girl i am friends with out but i am nervous to to so.
you will not know an answer if you do not ask
problem is if she says no then it would make things weird between us.  i am afraid that either way i may not be able to see her again.
label: apprehensive
response: just play it safe

situation: i went all the way to that whole foods store and they did not have ground bison
dialogue: i really wanted to try bison meet and i went all the way to that whole foods store like 57 miles away and they did not have it, what a waste of time
that sucks, after going all that way too and you did not even get to try it. i am sorry.
thank you! i hope i can find it somewhere locally. i have heard bison meat is very lean and good
label: disappointed
response: i hope you do get to try it soon. be sure to let me know how it is!

situation: my rottwieller passes a lot of gas  in the evenings.  it is so musky and it follows you wherever you go in the house.
dialogue: my rottweiler passes a lot of gas in the evenings.
that is funny.
not so much.  it is such a thick scent and it follows you everywhere you go in the house.  i usually put him out when he starts it up.
label: disgusted
response: wonder if it has to do with his diet?

situation: i had a rough day, my husband has been out of town and the weather has been bad.
dialogue: it is been a long week! my husband has been out of town and its been just me and a cranky toddler.
will he be back soon?
i sure hope so! he is in the military so i never know when he will get called on a mission
label: sad
response: okay, i see. that must be hard.

situation: i once walked around the grocery store with my fly down.  when i realized it i went to zip up and a lady with kids came round the corned at the same time.
dialogue: i once walkd around the grocery store without knowing my fly was down.
i think we have all done a version of that.
i found an empty aile a went to zip up.  just then a mom with kids comes around the corner.
label: embarrassed
response: ha, that is too funny.

situation: it has been a very quiet day in my house, i am all alone. hate watching movies by myself.
dialogue: it is been a hard day today, its so quiet in my house. i hate when my husband is out of town.
that sounds tough  does he get back soon?
in a few months, he is in the military so he is gone a lot but i know he is doing it for our family and our country!
label: lonely
response: you must be so proud of him!

situation: my little niece was recently rushed to hospital and i was worried sick about her. i really love my nieces and nephew and hate when something bad happens to them.
dialogue: my young niece, who is disabled, was recently rushed to hospital. she is ok now but we were very worried for a while there.
what was going on with her?
chest infection which, for her, can prove fatal. she had to go on a special oxygen machine till the antibiotics kicked in.
label: caring
response: that sounds pretty serious, glad she is okay now!

situation: i was sitting eating dinner when all of the sudden my cat jumped on the kitchen table and knocked over my food! i was so mad.
dialogue: i have this cat that loves to cause issues
what sort of issues?
like last night. she decided that she wanted to jump on the table
label: furious
response: cats are always getting into things and causing destruction.

situation: i have tried three different times to complete a work task.  each time i have failed.
dialogue: i have tried to complete a work assigment three times now without sucuess.
oh no, could you ask your supervisor for guidance?
doubtful.  i will try again and then try a coworker if not sucuessfull.
label: devastated
response: sounds like you have a good plan. i wish you the best

situation: i could not go to movies and my husband bought me that movie
dialogue: i could not go to movies to watch the greatest showman when it came out so my husband bought this movie when it came out. he is sweet
that was very sweet. what movie did you want to watch?
it is called the greatest showman. it is a musical! so good! i watched it so many times already
label: surprised
response: oh ok! the gift was a good idea so that you ca watch it as much as you want'

situation: a few weeks ago a coworker called in sick. i had to work twice as long as i normally would.
dialogue: a few weeks ago a coworker called in sick. i had to work twice as long as i normally would.
so you covered him. it was very noble from your side to act in this way
it was, but it did not help my feelings towards that coworker.
label: annoyed
response: well, at least you did something good for that co-worker and most probably he feels indebted toward you

situation: my wife had been out of the country for a couple months, and i thought she was getting back a week earlier than she actually was.
dialogue: my wife has been out of the country for school for 2 months.  i misread the calendar and thought she was getting back a week earlier than she is.
so you have to wait a week longer to see her again? that stinks.
yeah.  it could be worse, but it definitely put a cloud over things for half an hour or so.
label: disappointed
response: yeah, i can imagine. at least it is only one week!

situation: after years of trying to get back on my feet.  my family and i are finally moving into a house we will own.
dialogue: it is been awhile since i lost my last job.  after two years of working my family and i are finally moving into a home of our own.
great to hear that.i hope you enjoy your new life.
after such a long time we certainly will.  i cannot wait to start making the house into our home.
label: grateful
response: i am sure you will create a beautiful house.

situation: our pet will need to be put down soon.  she has suffered a long time with feline aids.
dialogue: our pet cat will need to be put down soon.
oh i am so sorry to hear that. have you had it since it was a kitten?
yes we have had her since the begining.  she is older now and has suffered with feline aids for awhile.
label: sad
response: that is so sad. i had a dog die unexpectedly and it tore me up.

situation: it makes me really mad to see homeless people on the street, i think there should not be that many homeless people makes me really mad
dialogue: it really makes me angry to see that many homeless people on the street
yeah i understand.  are there any charities nearby that you could volunteer for?
i personally do not have time to volunteer but every friday i always make a small donation to my local charity
label: furious
response: well that is good of you.  do you think homelessness is due to mental incapacities?

situation: my husband decided to throw a surprise birthday party for me and it was so shocking to see him jump out at me with all his friends
dialogue: my husband shocked me the other day
why did he do that?
he threw me a surprise party and jumped out at me scaring me half to death!
label: surprised
response: oh my, did you have a good time?

situation: i really believe in being with someone and only them forever. i know others see it differently, i just do not get why.
dialogue: i do not get why anyone would cheat on their other half.
i do not understand that either. it really makes you sick to think about. have you experienced this?
no thankfully  i havent. i would never do it. have you?
label: faithful
response: no i have not. i would never participate in that either. my wife and i are extremely happy together.

situation: i was planning to view the stars last night, but it was storming. it was supposed to be the brightest that jupiter will be in a while.
dialogue: i was planning to view the stars last night, but it was storming. it was supposed to be the brightest that jupiter will be in a while.
it always seems to work out like that does not it?
it does! i am hoping that tonight will be clear.
label: disappointed
response: i may have to check that out as well.

situation: i am slightly jealous of the time our new baby gets with my wife.  i understand the purpose and will deal with it but i also miss her too.
dialogue: a new baby means a lot changes.  one of those is the amount of time my wife and i have together.
yes, but they also bring about a lot of good changes as well.
agreed.  i know it is a necessary thing but i am a little jealous of the time my wife spends with the baby.
label: jealous
response: yes, the first years of a baby's life, the mother pretty much spends entirely with them. the husband is kind of left out in the cold.

situation: my mother is so sweet and giving. she is always there for her family, dedicated to us. she loves us more than anything!
dialogue: my mom is so great! she is always there for me and her grandchildren. i cannot think of anyone that loves us as much as she does!
that is wonderful! moms are truly a gift! i miss my mom at times. we are workcamping in the mountains of nm and my mom lives in tx.
i am sure that is hard at times. i have always lived close to my mom so i cannot really imagine being too far away.
label: caring
response: we have always moved frequently with my husbands job but my parents usually end up following us. now that we are fulltime rvers, they do not follow. i miss that sometimes. i am glad you have your mom close! cherish those times!

situation: workcamping in the mountains of nm. it took an hour and half to get to the grocery store. there was really no one around to chat with either. it was very hard to be so far from everything and have no new faces.
dialogue: i am dreading the two hour trip to the grocery store this week.
wow, yes, i always feel the same way! i would love to pass of grocery shopping to someone else.
me too! being so far out, it takes forever to get anywhere. i miss civilization.
label: lonely
response: i bet. i live about 20 minutes from a real town, which is far enough for me.

situation: i really like going to disneyland, i am planning a trip there for next summer vacation with my family
dialogue: im really exited to go to disneyland on vacation next summer
omg that sounds like so much fun! orlando?
yes i am staying at the hotel for the first time i am really happy
label: joyful
response: you are going to love it

situation: i finished a class and most of my classmates got an a! it took a lot of work.
dialogue: i finished a class and most of my classmates got an a! it took a lot of work.
that is great. takes a lot of dedication to be that prepared.
it sure does! i am so proud of the hard work that everyone put in!
label: impressed
response: you should be, not everyone can really be that dedicated about something.

situation: i have the best kids in the world.  the draw me pictures, make me laugh, and give lots of hugs and kisses.
dialogue: i have the best kids in the world.
what did they do this time?
lots of little stuff.  they love to draw me pictures, crack jokes, and give lots of kisses.
label: joyful
response: well that is very nice of them to do!

situation: my husband was able to get his promotion at work and i felt so glad for him. he had been working so hard every day to get recognized there.
dialogue: my husband has been putting in so many extra hours at work
i am sure hes doing it to take care of you guys and i am sure you are pampering him too for doing it.
oh i am pampering the heck out of him! it got him a promotion!
label: proud
response: pamper him all the way up until you get some lavish vacation! loooool  i am joking, partially! happy for you guys tho!

situation: i just got laid off from my job. i need the paycheck so this is not a good situation.
dialogue: i just got laid off from my job. i need the paycheck so this is not a good situation.
what will you try and do?
i am going to apply for new positions. hopefully i will get something soon.
label: sad
response: what is your field of work?

situation: i just applied for a new job! it is a job that i have always wanted.
dialogue: i just applied for a new job! it is a job that i have always wanted.
that is really cool i hope you get the job
thank you! have you ever applied to your dream job?
label: hopeful
response: not yet but i think once i have the skill for it i will defenetly will.

situation: i do not like when my girlfriend goes out to the club alone, i get really jelous
dialogue: i ahte when my girlfriend goes to the club alone
that would bother me as well. have you discussed this with her?
yeah it makes me really jelous when guys talk to her
label: jealous
response: i can understand that. i actually broke up with a previous girlfriend over the same type of thing.

situation: i used to work as a hotel rep in spain for a british travel company. one morning, i was greeting guests when, out of the corner of my eye i saw someone i recognized. i almost fell over it was my cousin who had come over from scotland without telling me. how lovely!
dialogue: when i worked as a hotel rep. in spain a few years ago i was greeting guests one morning. suddenly i saw someone i knew it was my cousin who decided to come and visit me. it was so unexpected!
oh that must have been so exciting and surprising!
it really was. i had no idea he was coming to visit. i could not believe my eyes!
label: surprised
response: did you all do some fun things while he was there?

situation: my keurig just died and its a 2 hour drive to town just to get another one. when there are 3 coffee drinkers in the house who drink coffee all day long, this is not good!
dialogue: my keurig just died. this is the third coffee pot in less than a year!
well, that is a real tragedy.
i agree! i am so disgusted right now! we drink a lot of coffee. its a 2 hour drive to the closest town to get another one too.
label: disgusted
response: can you buy two next time and have one in reserve?

situation: when i had to move for the first time i looked up all the moving tips in the world to figure out how to do it really well. it felt so great to be able to get everything moved and have not a single issue.
dialogue: i just had to move across country to a new job.
wow, that must've been hard to uproot your whole life. are you happy about the move?
i am actually! i was so ready for it. i basically studied moving so that everything would be easy
label: prepared
response: that is awesome! i have been wanting to do the same actually. i hope you have a fabulous time in your new place and new job!

situation: i was very upset one day when my daughter came off of the bus and was crying. a older boy intentionally tripped her when she was getting off the bus, and she got hurt!
dialogue: one day my daughter got off the bus and was crying. an older boy intentionally tripped her as she got off the bus and she got hurt. this made me very upset and mad!
what was the boy kid's problem?
he just thought it would be funny! he was also several years older than her and a teenager. too old to know better!
label: angry
response: maybe he has the crush on her?

situation: we were recently told that our 15 year old son has a degenerative neurological disease. the doctors tell us that there is no cure. i am really scared for his future.
dialogue: we recently found out that our 15 year old son has a rare, degenerative neurological disease.
i am so sorry to hear that. is there treatment or a cure?
no, the doctors tell us there is no cure. they are trying to treat the symptoms but thus far its been unsuccessful.
label: terrified
response: that sounds awful. how is he feeling?

situation: i could not believe it when the door bell rang and when i opened the door, my daughter and her family where standing there. i had not seen them for almost a year and they made a visit without telling me they were coming.
dialogue: the door bell rang last month. i was not expecting anyone, but it was my daughter and her family from way up north.
sounds like a nice surprise! my god how beautiful.
i could not believe it. it had been almost a year since i saw them and she never even gave me a hint they were coming.
label: surprised
response: that is seriously one of the best presents ever.  i am happy for you!

situation: i have studied hard all night in order to make myself ready for tomorrow's test.  summer semesters are stressfull.
dialogue: i have studied hard all night in order to make myself ready for tomorrow's test
your hard work should pay off! any strategies?
repititions and exposure are my strategies.  sumer semesters really ramp things up.
label: prepared
response: summer semesters are difficult. i did them too. best of luck to you!

situation: onboarding: going through an unused drawer i found old drawing from when my kids were little. it brought back many memories.
dialogue: going through an unused drawer i found old drawing from when my kids were little
brought back a lot of memories i guess ?
while the actual incidents of each drawing are lost in time it did make me think back to when they were younger.
label: sentimental
response: always nice to have memories of the good old days.

situation: i remember when my husband proposed to me. i was so giddy and happy that i fainted infront of everyone!
dialogue: i just had my husband remind me of when i fainted when he proposed!
wow, what an awesome proposal that must've been. and maybe a little embarrassing,.
i was so happy when i saw him get down on one knee that i just blacked out lmao
label: joyful
response: haha, sounds very sweet though.

situation: when i heard on the news that there was a tornado warning, i did not think much of it. then i heard the siren and high winds and i was so scared i almost panicked
dialogue: the news announced a tornado warning. i ignored it at first, but then the city tornado siren went off.
oh no, what are you going to do?
i almost panicked as the winds started to gust, but thankfully it missed us. a few miles up the road were not so lucky though. always listen to those warnings
label: trusting
response: i never listen to those warnings either, but now i will have second thoughts.

situation: i got a new puppy for my birthday! she is a cutie!
dialogue: i got a new puppy for my birthday! she is a cutie!
congratulations! what did you name her?
i named her dixie! she is a little basset hound.
label: grateful
response: congratulations! what did you name her?

situation: my neighbor ran into my car! they did not even leave a note!
dialogue: my neighbor ran into my car! they did not even leave a note!
what?  that is awful!  how did you find out it was them? did someone see it?
i could tell by the color of the paint left on my car, and their car now has a scrape with the color of my car. i do not know what to do.
label: angry
response: oh boy.  i would confront them kindly and tell them you would like to reach a solution without there being a fight or problem.  those situations are never fun. sorry.

situation: a thunderstorm raged all of last night! it kept me awake all night!
dialogue: a thunderstorm raged all of last night! it kept me awake all night!
thunder always keeps me up, it gets so loud sometimes! and the wind!
it is quite frightening! i wish that i could overcome my fear.
label: afraid
response: yes, i could understand how it could be very fearful. it is quite scary to be woken up that way as well.

situation: i just applied for graduate school! i feel good about my chances!
dialogue: i just applied for graduate school! i feel good about my chances!
i am so proud of you! i will pray for your success!
thank you! i am very excited! it is quite unsettling though.
label: hopeful
response: it is got to be so exciting though!

situation: i remember sitting in the garden and just feeling so whole and happy. it filled my soul with joy.
dialogue: i remember just taking a deep breath the other day in the garden and just feeling happy
that sounds lovely. do you have many flowers?
i have a garden so fully packed that i cannot see my neighbors at all!
label: content
response: that is quite impressive! you must be very proud of your work!

situation: a tree blew over in my yard after a big windstorm.  while i was cleaning things up, my neighbor came over unannounced with his chainsaw and started to cut up the tree.  then he helped me rake up the rest of the debris.  it was a very generous gesture.
dialogue: my neighbor really helped me out recently after a big windstorm.
that was very kind of them. did they charge you for their labor?
no, they generously helped me clean up my yard and cut up a tree with their chainsaw, and they asked for nothing in return.
label: grateful
response: that sounds like a good neighbor. i hope that your home was not damaged.

situation: my son just graduated from high school! he has worked so hard, and he even earned a scholarship.
dialogue: my son just graduated from high school! he has worked so hard, and he even earned a scholarship.
congratulations to you both!  what is he going to study in college?
thank you! he is going to study computer science!
label: proud
response: that is a great degree for the future and getting a job.  good luck to him.

situation: i am taking a trip to disney world next month! my wife is going for the first time!
dialogue: i am taking a trip to disney world next month! my wife is going for the first time!
that is so awesome, i am really jealous! i have never been either, and i am actually saving up for a trip!
i have been a couple of times before, and it is such a magical place! where are you planning on taking a trip to?
label: excited
response: disney world too, i have always wanted to go! i hope you guys have a wonderful time!

situation: i slipped and fell in the restroom last week. the floors desperately needed cleaned.
dialogue: i slipped and fell in the restroom last week. the floors desperately needed cleaned.
i am sorry i hope you did not get injured
the only thing to get injured was my pride. it was quite the gross experience.
label: disgusted
response: lol i can imagine

situation: one thing which really gets my goat is being kept on hold by customer service. the other day comcast kept me waiting 20 minutes to speak with someone.
dialogue: the other day comcast customer service kept me waiting for 20 minutes just to speak with someone. what a disgrace!
they are such a bad company
they are awful. if they'd just employ enough cs people to handle the volume you could just about bear it!
label: annoyed
response: oh yea exactly

situation: something which really irks me is someone queue jumping. the other day i was standing at the deli counter of my local store and some guy just walked up and started asking for stuff. the employee served him, too.
dialogue: queue jumping is something which irks me no end. i was at the deli counter of my local store recently and some guy came up and started ordering. the employee served him, too.
it is quite disheartening to know people jump queues
yes. and i am disabled and it is hard to stand for a long time while some idiot gets his lunch. i hope it was horrible!
label: annoyed
response: i believe he will pay somehow. they call it karma

situation: i am so glad that we took precautions and evacuated for hurricane harvey, even though our area was spared. we had enough food and water stocked up and we moved inland just in case.
dialogue: i am very glad we headed the warnings and evacuated prior to hurricane harvey.
that must have been scary.  it is always better to be safe in a situation like that.
yes it was a scary time. we stocked up on food and bottled water and moved our rv about an hour and a half inland. luckily the storn went to the north of us.
label: prepared
response: it is great that you had an rv to stock and pack more things.  glad to hear the storm missed you!

situation: my husband caught me off guard with wonderful mother's day gifts on the last one. he even got me a gorgeous diamond ring! i was not expecting it.
dialogue: this past mother's day my husband gave me some wonderful unexpected gifts! he even got me a gorgeous diamond ring.
wow you are lucky to have someone so thoughtful. i bet you were feeling great.
i was! it was so thoughtful and sweet, and i was very touched by it.
label: surprised
response: that is awesome. i am sure you will return the favor one day.

situation: my parents are going to a tea room for their anniversary.  i wanted to go with them but when i called the restaurant they said they could not accommodate my special diet. i was so disappointed.
dialogue: my parents are going to a tea room for their anniversary.
did you plan the anniversary?
no that is where they decided to go but the thing is i called the place and they cannot accommodate my special diet i am on.  i am so sad b/c that means i cannot go with the.
label: disappointed
response: well, hopefully they still have a good time.

situation: we are going to be having our 7th grandbaby soon! i am so happy!
dialogue: i am very excited for the arrival of our 7th grandbaby!
oh that is great. you must be the luckiest granddad in the whole world
thank you, i try to be the best nana i can be. we are hoping she comes while we are visiting for christmas!
label: joyful
response: all the best buddy enjoy the celebrations

situation: my dad has dementia.  i try my hardest to be as caring with him as i can b/c i know he does not mean to be harsh or hard to deal with at times
dialogue: my dad has early onset dementia
i am sorry to hear that, its very hard to cope with
yes, i try my hardest to be caring and patient with him b/c i know he does not mean to be harsh or hard to deal with at times.
label: caring
response: it is, i feel for you! i had a relative that progressively got worse and its extremely difficult

situation: at work today, all my coworkers sang me happy birthday. it was so nice of them!
dialogue: at work today, all my coworkers sang me happy birthday. it was so nice of them!
that is awesome! i love when people remember my birthday.
it was so thoughtful of them. i did not even mention it was my birthday.
label: joyful
response: how fun! i wonder how they knew.

situation: i took a huge test today and man it made me so nervous. i really hope i did well on it.
dialogue: i took a huge test today and man it made me so nervous. i really hope i did well on it.
did you study hard?
i did, i studied every day for week! i almost wore myself out studying.
label: anxious
response: then i am sure you will do well.

situation: i am so proud of my son
dialogue: i am so proud of my son
what did he do?
he got the highest score on a test
label: proud
response: that is impressive! i hope he is proud too!

situation: my husband usually gets a big bonus this time of the year! we are eagerly waiting for it, and hoping!
dialogue: my husband usually gets a big bonus around this time of the year. we are eagerly waiting, hoping, and waiting for it!
oh that is awesome! its so nice to get money in a lumpsum
it is! it is not a guarantee though, so it is just a waiting game, and not easy.
label: anticipating
response: that makes it very difficult, and hard not to get your hopes up

situation: i am so angry that my brother did not come to my party
dialogue: i am so angry that my brother did not come to my party
oh wow! i would be very angry as well! unless it was some kind of emergency or extenuating circumstance
i am not sure. i just do not know why he did not show
label: angry
response: he did not even call to let you know whats going on?

situation: i am confident that i will have a great day tomorrow
dialogue: i am confident that i will have a great day tomorrow
that is a great mindset to have, and should lead to a great day!
that is so true. getting to know you also makes it seem like a great day already leading to tomorrow.
label: confident
response: that is a very kind thing to say! i appreciate that

situation: i have trusting issues because my fiance left me
dialogue: i have trusting issues because my fiance left  me
that is sad to hear. do not worry, you will find someone that is for you.
i know but it is so hard because no one wants to be with me
label: trusting
response: it seems like that but it is not true. you have to be patient and you will find your love one day.

situation: i once had to board a long haul international flight immediately after a major travel alert was issued.
dialogue: flying typically does not bother me too much, because i love travel. however i was a bit concerned on a flight once right after a travel advisory had been issued.
i would have been terrified, like need a nice strong drink type of terrified! how did it end up going?
well i did have a few of those. it went fine. i was still nervous even after we landed in a foreign country. i just watched my surroundings. everything went great.
label: apprehensive
response: i am glad it all went well! it seems that sometimes when you are extremely nervous it can make time pass quickly too.

situation: i am so lonely right now because no one wants to be with me
dialogue: i am so lonely right now because no one wants to be with me
i am sad to hear that. have you tried using social media to make new friends?
yeah, but no luck
label: lonely
response: try going to the park then. you could run into someone that is into you.

situation: one year for christmas i really wanted a new computer but knew there was no way it was happening, but my parents surprised me with a new computer.
dialogue: when i was younger i was really getting into graphic design and really wanted a new apple computer. i knew my parents could not afford it, but they somehow made it happen and surprised me on christmas.
that is awesome! parents are the best
yea my parents are pretty great. pretty maddening at times, but i would not trade them.
label: joyful
response: lol i know the feeling! and being a parent i now understnd

situation: i felt really proud when i won my poker tournament, there was a lot of people so it was really hard
dialogue: i felt really good when i won a poker tournament last week
awesome! was it hold em?
yes it was, it took a long time to do but at the end it was worth it
label: proud
response: most def, i love playing hold em

situation: i am really scared of spiders i cannot stand them, i think it is my worst fear
dialogue: spiders is one of my gratest fear they make me so scared
i also do not like spiders. i do not even like watching spiderman due to not liking spiders.
i have tried to overcome my fear but i just cannot they make my skin temble
label: afraid
response: maybe you can go see a doctor and he can help you with your fear.

situation: i get shocked at how the growth rate of video games is off the charts, video games have com such a long way
dialogue: i am impressed that video games grow so much every year
the only video game i have ever played is super mario.
that is a great game the growth on video games has been amazing this past few years
label: impressed
response: it is a classic, even my kids enjoy playing it.

situation: we tried a new restaurant for our anniversary that came highly rated by everyone in the community. when they got our order wrong and did't cook our food right i was mad and disappointed. i tried not to let it ruin the night.
dialogue: we went out to dinner for our first anniversary and they got our order all wrong.
thats always terrible, but congrats on the anniversary!
thank you. the restaurant came highly rated by a lot of people so i guess my expectations were high. i tried not to let it bother me.
label: annoyed
response: that makes the situation worse when your expectations are through the roof

situation: my flew home to see family. it is very quite at home now.
dialogue: my wife flew home to see family. it is very quite at home now.
i definitely relate to that feeling, why cannot they take us with them!?
i know, that would of been nice! instead i was all alone for the last few weeks.
label: lonely
response: well, i hope she gets home soon, to make the home, a home again!

situation: everytime i see my nephew i am really in shock of how fast he grows now
dialogue: i am really impressed everytime i see my nephew on how fast he is growing
it is pretty crazy how fast grow up when you get older, it seems like a couple of weeks and they are in high school
yeah but i do not see him very often maybe that is why i always get shocked when i see him
label: surprised
response: that is definitely a factor, sometimes i forget about some of my nephews even exist.

situation: i was so upset the day i found out my mother had cancer. we were at the theater getting ready to watch movie when i got the phone call. i felt heartbroken.
dialogue: when i got the phone call that my mom had cancer i was so upset.
i am so sorry to hear that. no one should have to go through something like that.
it is hard watching one of your parents get sick. we were at the movie theater when i found out and i had to leave.
label: angry
response: i am sure i would have done the same thing! but stay strong, many people have beaten cancer! keep a positive attitude and stay by her side!

situation: i felt really good the day i gratuated ffrom highschool, i was hard but i manage to do it
dialogue: one of the best days of my life was when i graduated from high school
that was an awesome day for me too, hard to believe it was nearly  10 years ago
i know right time goes really fast and you do not even noticed, for me it was 13 years ago
label: proud
response: agreed! its a shame growing up how fast you wanted to be an adult

situation: the other night i was driving home in the rain and slid into the guard rail. it is going to cost so much to get my car fixed!
dialogue: the other night i was driving home in the rain and slid into the guard rail. it is going to cost so much to get my car fixed!
oh man, now that sucks! you gotta be careful on those wet roads. at least you are okay.
i know, i will have to be more careful next time. i should not eat ice-cream while driving,
label: disappointed
response: is your car still drivable?

situation: there is a tornado coming. but i have the pantry full and am ready this time.
dialogue: there is a tornado coming. but i have the pantry full and am ready this time.
good thinking.  you can never be too prepared, only under prepared.
you never know how long the power might be out for!
label: prepared
response: yep! or if you are house will be hit.  many possibilities with tornadoes!

situation: i had a a pretty expensive monthly payment on a loan, with somewhat high interest. out of the blue, my mother paid the loan off!
dialogue: i had a pretty large loan, with a bit of a high interest rate, and a high monthly payment. my mother decided to pay it off for me, out of the blue!
oh my goodness. what a blessing
yes, i could not believe it. she is so sweet and giving, but i sure did not expect her to do that!
label: surprised
response: it much be a huge weight off of your shoulder

situation: my husband is the most faithful person i know.  i have many health problems and he just shows complete love and faithfulness to me no matter what
dialogue: my husband is the most faithful man i know
that is great to hear! a faithful spouse is a blessing
i have so many health problems and he is always there for many no matter what being loving and caring
label: faithful
response: i am sorry to hear about that! i hope everything gets better for you!

situation: i left the front door unlocked and the mailman robbed me. i could not believe i would do that.
dialogue: i left the front door unlocked and the mailman robbed me. i could not believe i would do that.
oh no, i hope you did any sustain any injury
only my pride! i was not at home when he robbed me. he took a lot of valuables.
label: disappointed
response: yea, he will definitely get caught

situation: snakes make me almost pee my pants they make me so scared i do not even like seeing them in pictures
dialogue: i have always been afraid of snakes i do not know what to do to control my fear for them
that makes two of us! i am terrified of all snakes
yes, i one time i was taking a hike and 3 meters to my left was a rattle snake i jumped like a rabbit and ran back to my friends
label: terrified
response: eww that is disgusting, and makes it worse it was a poisonous snake

situation: i was annoyed when my wife left me
dialogue: i was annoyed when my wife left me
ah that is terrible. i would be annoyed as well i think.
yeah its been a rough 2 weeks for me
label: annoyed
response: i am sorry to here that, but life goes on and tomorrow is another day. we just have to make the best with what we are given. you will get through this.

situation: i was afraid when i went into the movies alone
dialogue: i was afraid when i went into the movies alone
really why is that?
because i have always been with someone, so going in alone just frightened me
label: afraid
response: i think with time you will get used to it.

situation: i have been married a long time and my husband does a lot of travel. but, we both have trust in each to be loyal and true.
dialogue: i have been married almost 23 years. my husband travel so much, but we both have trust in each other to be true and loyal.
that is great, why does he travel so much?
for his job. so, it can be hard, but we trust each other.
label: faithful
response: what does he do for his job?

situation: i am hopeful that my friend will be able to make it to my party
dialogue: i am hopeful that my friend will be able to make it to my party
that is good, is it very important that this friend be there?
it is to me because he is my best friend
label: hopeful
response: that makes sense!  i am sure he will be there for you!

situation: i think my self esteem has gotten a lot better. i have been doing a lot more exercise and self care and it makes me feel good.
dialogue: i have been exercising and taking care of myself more lately.
there you go! i need to work on that area of my life as well.
i think many do, but man does it feel good.
label: confident
response: i bet you have more energy and more confidence for sure!

situation: i am joyful that i am with my wife
dialogue: i am joyful that i am with my wife
how you been together long?
we have been together for 10 years
label: joyful
response: awesome. i have got you beat by 1 year. you know i just read the average couple from the time to meet to the time the ends things is 6 years. if you make it past that it will probably last for every.

situation: i recently won a $100 on a scratch off! i never win so i was really taken back.
dialogue: i felt pretty luck the other day! i won $100 on a scratch off ticket! i never win!
you are pretty lucky!
not usually, i never win. so, it was very unexpected.
label: surprised
response: maybe i should buy some. i never win either. its about time

situation: my sister was given $1,000 by my grandma as a graduation present. she did not give me a penny.
dialogue: my sister was given $1,000 by my grandma as a graduation present. she did not give me a penny.
i am sorry, maybe she will share?
perhaps, i just do not understand why i was left out. seems unfair.
label: jealous
response: that is infair

situation: we recently went to the beach for our vacation and it rained a few days while there. we were hoping to spend every day at the beach.
dialogue: we went on our vacation about a week ago to the beach and it rained several days while we were there. we wanted to go to the beach every day!
i hate when that happens! especially when you have been waiting for the beach!
yes, and when you pay a fortune to get beachfront! but, we still had a good time, just wished we could have had less rain!
label: disappointed
response: that is what matters most, that you had a good time and made memories!

situation: i was given the opportunity to work at a new job that i was hoping to get! i never thought it would be possible!
dialogue: i was given the opportunity to work at a new job that i was hoping to get! i never thought it would be possible!
congratulations! i am sure you earned it!
thank you! i feel very fortunate to have been given the opportunity.
label: grateful
response: you are welcome. i wish you the best in the new position.

situation: i fell down in a mud puddle today while walking to lunch. i was covered in mud for the rest of the work day.
dialogue: i fell down in a mud puddle today while walking to lunch. i was covered in mud for the rest of the work day.
oh no! that is awful, that can mess with your mood.
no kidding! it was hard to keep a good attitude for the rest of the day.
label: embarrassed
response: i can understand that!

situation: i do not like being alone at night when my husband is working overnights. i want him back on days so badly.
dialogue: my husband works nights a lot right now.
i bet that is a rough schedule.
it really is, i hate being alone at night.
label: lonely
response: does he get any nights off?

situation: i am anxious, if excited, about an upcoming move. we have lived overseas before, but *this* is a very different in terms of both location and climate.
dialogue: i am anxious (if excited!) about an upcoming move, we have lived overseas before, but this is such a different state and climate, i am not sure what to expect!
it sounds like a great chance to start over fresh! where are you moving to?
alaska! we have got some transition time, but i have been doing deep research on anchorage, and the more i see, the more i like!
label: apprehensive
response: oh wow! how exciting! i cannot wait to come visit you there so you can show me the sights!

situation: there is a few different girls that work with my husband that over the years have hit on him. i know i trust him but they still bother me.
dialogue: i hate that people hit on others they know are married.
ugh, why do people do that? it is annoying.
right? happens to my husband all the time and it is just frustrating.
label: jealous
response: do you smack the women who do it?

situation: i cannot wait for the next starwars movie, there my favorite movies of all time
dialogue: i cannot wait for the next star wars movie to come out
yeah, they are so good! george lucas is a genius!
he is, i really like the new ones but always will like the old ones better
label: excited
response: yeah me too. i prefer the first three. they are very different from the others.

situation: i hate farting in public it is the worst thing that can happen to you in public
dialogue: i hate when i fart in public it is so embarrasing
you are unable to hold them in?
i can hold them but some of them are just accidental and it is the worst, depends on what i eat haha
label: embarrassed
response: i am sorry, that must be pretty rough on you!

situation: my husband bought me a beautiful diamond 14 kt gold ring! i did not have any idea he was going to get it for me.
dialogue: my husband recently got me a great gift. he got me a beautiful 14 kt diamond ring! i had no idea he was.
wow that is awesome
yes, it was so sweet and unexpected. we have been married almost 23 years so i guess i deserve it
label: surprised
response: that is a long time

situation: it makes me really sad that people do not care about throwing trash on the streets.
dialogue: i hate that people do not care and they just throw their trash on the street
do you pick up after them or tell them anything?
if i am walking i pick up as much as i can
label: sentimental
response: thats good of you

situation: i hate going near hights they make me terrified, as soon as i look down and see the bottom i get so scared
dialogue: i am extremely afraid of going near hiights
oh i can relate i am also afraid of that
yeah last year i went to disneyland and got on the elevator game and i almost cried hahaha
label: afraid
response: haha . i remember a time i was in vegas i was scared to go on this really high ride

situation: i had gone on an interview for a job i wanted.  i was waiting to hear back, but it was taking a really long time for them to contact me.
dialogue: the last job interview i went on also went well, but it took a long time to hear back from them.
i hope you get that call soon!
oh, i did eventually, it just took like a month.  i ended up getting the job!
label: anxious
response: wow that is great, congrats!

situation: i am really exited on going to disneyland next summer, i will go with all my family and cannot wait
dialogue: i cannot wait for my disneyland vacation next summer
oh nice, how long are you going for ?
i think me and my family is going there for 1 week it is going to be wonderfull
label: joyful
response: that sounds like a great time.

situation: i cannot wait for my new car, they told me it was going to take 1 week but they told me they where taking 1 more week so i cannot wait
dialogue: i am getting my new car next week and cannot wait for it.
i understand that! what kind of car is it?
it is a 2017 bmw, i traded in my old car to get an awesome deal
label: excited
response: that is pretty fancy! does it have all the bells and whistles?

situation: it means a lot to me that my in-laws are helping us buy school clothes for our girls. that takes a burden off of us. they do not even realize how much they are helping us, they are just doing it because they love us and they love the girls.
dialogue: my in-laws are helping us pay for school clothes for our kids this year.
that is great! i know my sister has had help with that a lot too! it can get expensive. you know they have new clothes from target at goodwill a lot, that helps with spending
yeah, it helps take some of the burden off of us. i will have to check out goodwill and see if i can find anything.
label: grateful
response: it is like $5 for new clothes, good quality a lot. great! yes it is a lot to buy clothes for ever growing kids

situation: when i was in college i was in a class with an older woman who was a returning student.  she heard me talking about a paper idea i had, then presented it as her own, stealing my work.
dialogue: i was in a college class once with an older woman.  she took a paper idea i had talked about and presented it as her own, stealing all the work i had done.
that is despicable. did you report her to the teacher?
i did.  there was not much she could do, but at least i could still do the same paper without having to redo a bunch of work.
label: angry
response: she could drop her from the class and give her an f!

situation: i hate waiting it is the worst thing for me, if i am waiting more than 5 minutes i am getting really anxious
dialogue: i really hate when people make me wait for no reason
me too! who did this to you?
my girlfriend allways makes me wait, it makes me really anxious ahhahah
label: anxious
response: i understand that! when i am ready to go- i just want to hurry up and go. i hate sitting around waiting too. maybe you should make her wait and see if she likes it. lesson

situation: my best friend is moving to another town and i do not know when i will get to see her again.
dialogue: one of my best friends is moving far away and i do not know when i will be able to see him again
that is so sad! can you email them?
yeah i can call him and email him, it is just that i do not know when we will see eachother again
label: sad
response: can you see him before he goes?

situation: i was impressed the other day, my mother in law is working hard on her weigh goal. she has managed to lose 10 lbs and walks her 3 miles every day.
dialogue: i think having goals is important. my mother in law has managed to lose weight and walked daily.
hey, that is pretty good. do you have any goals set for yourself?
very similar ones, but i like focusing on others success
label: proud
response: well i hope yours work out as well. focusing on the goals of others probably gives you a lot of inspiration.

situation: it really makes me sad to think there are people who treat animals like trash, animal cruelty is a really serious matter
dialogue: i hate to see people mistreating animals i cannot stand it
oh i know! i could kill people like that.
i know right, it is really sad some people cannot understand they suffer as well as you and me
label: sad
response: and they do not have a voice of their own.

situation: i was really happy the day i gratuaded from college, i think it was one of the best days of my life, it was a lot of hard work but it paid off
dialogue: the day i gratuaded from college is my favorite day
congratulations! what made it so great?
the fact that it took so much work and time
label: proud
response: ah, well you earned it!

situation: i am getting a brand new tv this weekend i cannot wait for it, it will be twice as big as the one i have now
dialogue: i cannot wait for my new tv that i ordered online and will recive this weekend
oh. congrats. you must be happy then
yeah it is twice the size as the tv that i have at the moment
label: content
response: wow then.. do you have any special plans to celebrate ?

situation: i have an older friend who lost her husband a couple of years back and i help her to move on in life
dialogue: i have an older friend who i try to help out.  she lost her husband a couple years ago.
that is very admirable of you.  how do you help her?
we go out to lunch regularly.  she is depressed and i try and get her out of the house to do things.
label: caring
response: we need more people like you in the world.  theres always someone out there who needs a helping hand and could use a friend.

situation: i think it is scary what is happening in the us. i do not care who is in charge, i think we need to come together from all sides and save our country.
dialogue: we need to come together as a country and be united and solve our issues, no matter your views.
i totally agree. people are too divided by their political views these days.
exactly, let's comprimise and decide on things before it is to late!
label: terrified
response: everyone is always fighting over these things, it is a sad thing to see.

situation: i spent a christmas working in a computer lab on a school project.  my family were thousands of miles away celebrating together, but i had to work on my project by myself.  it was not at all festive and i felt isolated.
dialogue: i spent my first christmas away from home in a computer lab, working by myself.
oh! pity about you.
yes, it was not very fun.  but i had to do it because my project for work was due the next day.
label: lonely
response: hope you had good time after your work!

situation: i miss my dog who died last year
dialogue: i miss my dog kat
i am so sorry to hear that.
yes she was a wonderful black lab who died last year.  she was a great dog
label: sentimental
response: i hope you find a new puppy love soon.

situation: i think it is great how well my husband is doing in his new manager job. he is become the top assistant in his market in just 2 years.
dialogue: it is great to see my husband doing so well.
i am glad to hear that!  what is happening with him?
he is become the top manager in his division in just two years.
label: impressed
response: that is awesome!  i hope he got a good raise

situation: i feel very upset about the treatment that some people can have with their pets, this is not good,
dialogue: hello, i am very upset about the abuse of some people with their pets . it is unacceptable
i cannot imagine why people would do that. animals are helpless.
i feel that pain . as if i had been hit
label: furious
response: you are very empathetic then! i hate seeing animals suffer as well.

situation: i went on a hike in the mountains of la by myself at night.
dialogue: that reminds me of the time i went to la for vacation with my family. i wanted to meet people so i went hiking in the mountains but it soon became dark.
hiking is probably a tough environment to meet people! la is real nice, but i hear the people there are not/
yea it probably was not the smartest decision but at the end i meat a nice group. they eventually helped me from that situation also.
label: terrified
response: that is cool! did you end up keeping up with them after you left?

situation: seeing a statue we made for a recently passed away pet made me really sad. it was such a fitting tribute to her life and the love we had for her.
dialogue: i really miss my puppy, we got her a statue for the backyard to remember her always.
that is sweet to have such a memory of her. did she pass away then?
yes, she was very old. it was a great tribute to her life.
label: sentimental
response: i am so sorry, pets are like children

situation: my son is teething i gave him motrin
dialogue: my son is teething and he is so cranky! i gave him tylenol and got some teething toys. i don
teething is a hard period for babies and moms
it is! his molars are coming so he is inconsolable! does not sleep good, does not want to eat. poor little boy
label: caring
response: poor baby. i remember my kids teething too. it was horrible

situation: i was trying to sleep train my son but i failed
dialogue: i was trying to sleep train my son but i failed. i did not it is gonna be that hard. i think we will be co sleeping till he goes to college
ha ha, i am sure he will get the the hang of it eventually. it takes some children longer than others to get used to.
i hope so, i miss sleeping in a comfortable position without baby feet in my face
label: disappointed
response: i am not looking forward to it when i have a kid! i cannot function without a good 8 hours of sleep.

situation: i have seen some pictures of friends of mine traveling around italy
dialogue: i have been seeing pictures of friends of mine traveling around italy.
how does that make you feel ?
i wish i were with them.  i love italy
label: jealous
response: i have never left the us. i have never been north of kentucky.

situation: my friend bought me lunch
dialogue: my friend bought me lunch today
that was nice. what did you have?
i had a nice burger and fries
label: grateful
response: that sounds good. i bet it was fun to hangout and eat with your friend.

situation: i got cut off in traffic the other day. there was noone behind me for a long way but no, they had to go right in front of me. had to slam my breaks
dialogue: i hate when people pull in front of you, especially when it is clear behidn you.
it is very annoying! i hate it too
had to slam my brakes. i do not get people at all.
label: furious
response: some people should not be allowed to drive! we were rear ended 2 times last months! can you believe that

situation: i am afraid of the dark
dialogue: i know i am an adult but i am very scared of the dark. i have a good imagination so i always see something creepy
that;s ok, everyone has some kinda fears that make little sense to others.
that is why i cannot sleep alone or if i am alone i always keep the light on
label: afraid
response: hey, i cannot sleep without socks. it is no big deal.

situation: i like to help at the animal shelter walking the dogs. they get a chance to get out of their cages and be with a nice human like me.
