dialogue: i was eating dinner with my husband last night and i was so happy
sometimes the simplest things are the nicest
i whole heatedly agree! it was just so freeing and peaceful
label: content
response: i hope you have many more then!

situation: one time someone came to my door with a gun. he wanted money but i did not have any so he stole some items from the house
dialogue: someone came to my door with a gun the other day.
what did you do in response?
i called the police after he robbed me.
label: afraid
response: that is awful, did you get injured at all?

situation: i made some food and put it on the coffee table. i went upstairs to get something and i found my dog had eaten my food
dialogue: i left my food on the coffee table and my dog ate it.
that is a terrible tragedy, my friend. did the dog get sick?
no, she is fine. i had to find something else to eat though.
label: annoyed
response: well that is good. what did you find?

situation: one time my brother was playing music really loud while i was trying to study. it made it hard for me to focus
dialogue: i was trying to study for a test one night and my brother was listening to loud music
did you ask him to turn it down?  or did you just go flip the circuit breaker to the house?
i would have totally flipped the circuit breaker if i knew how, but i just asked him to turn it down
label: annoyed
response: did he do it?  cause if not, i might have needed to give him a high five, on the head, with a chair.

situation: i was outside with my dog and she went to the bathroom. a few minutes later she tried to eat her poo
dialogue: my dog tried to eat her poo
that is pretty disgusting! did it look like poo coming out again?
it probably will.
label: disgusted
response: i can imagine. maybe it will morph into a super saiyan poo or something.

situation: i borrowed a book from the library one time and left it outside. it rained and the book was ruined.
dialogue: i borrowed a book from the library the other day but i left it outside
that is a dang shame. did it get rained on?
yes it did, unfortunately
label: ashamed
response: that is too bad. well, on the bright side, maybe a hobo will find it, read it, enlighten himself, and get a job at mcdonalds.

situation: i was in for a treat the other day when my husband got home with some chocolate. he likes to do things like that from time to time.
dialogue: i got something nice the other day, chocolates from my husband
wow that must have been a surprise for you
it was, and he does that type of thing a lot.
label: surprised
response: you got a great husband

situation: i have problems with the city and their constant tax increase on my property.
dialogue: i have problems with the city and their constant tax increase on my property.
i know how you feel, it is terrible. i actually moved to a completely different state due to hi taxes.
maybe a move out of my state would be the answer and a blessing to the high taxes.
label: trusting
response: it is worth it to consider. i pay less than half in property tax than i used to.

situation: everyday i wake up and see my girlfriends beautiful face, that on its on will always keep me faithful.
dialogue: i always do the same, it is not had when they are perfect.
always do the same what? what is perfect?
my girlfriend, how about you? do you have a partner?
label: faithful
response: i have been married for 19 years and we have been together 21.

situation: i close on my new house monday, i did not think i was going to be able to purchase it but i believed in my mortgage adviser.
dialogue: i close on my new house monday, i did not think i was going to be able to purchase it but i believed in my mortgage adviser
i have been through that process before and it was not easy. good thing you had a good adviser.
surprisingly it is been a painless process. i am very thankful.
label: trusting
response: you have been very lucky. you should keep their business card in case you ever decide to buy another house.

situation: i have a friend that i have known for many years. i recently gave her some money that she promised she would pay back but now i have not heard a word from her. i thought i could count on her but i guess i cannot.
dialogue: i gave my friend some money that she said she would pay back but she hasn't yet.
i hate when that happens!
i really thought  i could count on her, but now i have not even heard a word from her. lesson learned i guess.
label: trusting
response: that is how it goes. i usually consider the money as a lost cause when lending to friends.

situation: when i was a child a stole my mother's card details to pay for a subscription.
dialogue: i actually did this, i am terrible.
did what?
i stole my mother's card details to pay for a subscription.
label: ashamed
response: i have too.. to pay for food though. she told me that she would have paid if i asked but i am too proud.

situation: we are going to six flags this weekend and my kids want me to ride one of the roller coasters. i have not ridden one in a very long time and i am really hesitant because i do not think i will like it at all. i really just want to watch.
dialogue: we are going to six flags this weekend and my kids want me to ride the roller coaster with them.
sounds like found!   are you scared of roller coasters?  i love them!
i am really hesitant to get on. it is been a long time since i have ridden one and i do not think i am going to like it at all
label: apprehensive
response: i hope you do have fun!

situation: when i lost my dog of 12 years i was absolutely devastated.
dialogue: when i lost my dog of 12 years i was devastated.
i know how you feel! our dog of 8 years past away last week spring. it can be so hard
it is a horrible experience and i hope that i never have to go through it again, how did yours die?
label: devastated
response: same here. we do not know. he was perfectly fine the night before. we woke up to find him passed away at the foot of our bed. do you know how yours passed?

situation: i think that in the past i have spent time caring about things that are not important.
dialogue: i think that in the past i have spent time caring about things that are not important.
what kind of thing?  you could always change that in the future.
money mostly. i just wish i could have enough of it to be set for life.
label: caring
response: of course, but that is certainly not the most important thing in life, i hope you realize now.

situation: every winter, i cannot help but think back to when i was growing up and the neighborhood we grew up it. we had great neighbors and everyone was so close that we even spent holidays together.
dialogue: i love thinking back to when i was growing up and the neighborhood we lived in. so many great memories.
that is such a great feeling.
it really is. all the neighbors were so close, we even spent holidays together. it was like a really huge family all living together.
label: sentimental
response: that sounds really nice. i do not know my neighbors at all

situation: i really enjoy watching videos on youtube. i feel the content is really good.
dialogue: do you watch any youtube at all?
i watch everyday. love youtube!
what type of content do you like watching?
label: content
response: i like self help, motivation, healthy living, and a little bit of conspiracy.

situation: i sat in my kitchen eating an entire cake to myself in the middle of the night. i felt so wrong but so great!
dialogue: the other night i wanted cake when i woke up in the middle of the night
oh i get those midnight cravings all the time!
the worst part was that there was a cake to be eaten! so i did! lmao
label: ashamed
response: you want cake? cake is there? obviously you have to eat it!

situation: i was trying to learn how to make a steak and i was so scared of the flame on the grill! it was so hot!
dialogue: my husband was teaching me how to make a steak. the flame was so warm!
that sounds like a fun thing to do as a couple.
it was but i was so sad that i was so scared
label: apprehensive
response: why were you so scared?

situation: i looked at my childhood photos the other day. i just sat there remembering how much fun i used to have
dialogue: i looked at my childhood photos the other day. i remember alled the fun i used to ahve
oh really, that sounds nice. i miss childhood.
i do to. it was much easier then for me
label: sentimental
response: sometimes i feel as though our generation (assuming you are a few years around 30) really got a bad deal as far as the economy, politics, and the overall love in the country is concerned.

situation: i have to rely on my prayers and my belief in a high power to get me through not having a job and no money.
dialogue: i have to rely on my prayers and my belief in a high power to get me through not having a job and no money.
things work out. it does not seem like it but they do.
i remind myself all the time that it will work out and all will be good again.
label: faithful
response: it will. i am sure of it.

situation: i was very sad when i found out that my neighbors houses were going to be demolished because the city ordered it.
dialogue: i was very sad when i found out that my neighbors houses were going to be demolished because the city ordered it.
is the city going to build them new ones at least?
nope. they bought them out at city valued tax prices and they have 60 days to find another place to live.
label: devastated
response: well at least they bought them out and they will not be homeless. still sucks though.

situation: one time when i feel off my bike in front of all of my friends i was embarrassed.
dialogue: i feel off my bike the other day. it hurt.
oh no! how badly did you hurt yourself?
a few scraps to my elbows but nothing major, i was just embarrassed.
label: embarrassed
response: that does not sound too bad, it could have been much worse!

situation: i am patiently anticipating the release of fallout:76
dialogue: hey, any interest in video games?
yes i do play some video games.
great, i am anticipating the release of fallout:76 how about you?
label: anticipating
response: i have heard some very good things about it. it does not come out until november right?

situation: i get jealous when i see my friends earning more money then myself.
dialogue: is not it annoying when your friends earn more money then you but you work just as hard.
sometimes life is not very fair. i like to think of it as motivation to get a better job.
very true. i suppose i just get a bit jealous sometimes.
label: jealous
response: it happens, i think it is part of human nature. just try and focus on your own well-being and you will be alright!

situation: this year i felt confident in my exams.
dialogue: i exams went really well this year, how has your year gone?
good for you!.  my year have been ok too so far.
thanks, i am feeling a lot more confident in myself. remember the year can only get better.
label: confident
response: you seem to be very hopeful!  that is great.

situation: today was a bad day, but fortunately i was prepared.
dialogue: had a good day today, i think i was prepared for everything. how has your day been?
i am so glad to hear that! did anything in particular make it a good day? mine's been awesome too!
well i had a meeting with my boss who gave me a promotion today so i am over the moon!.
label: prepared
response: sick, congratulations! time to celebrate right?

situation: i was attacked by bees a few months ago, they we are furious.
dialogue: i got attacked by a swarm of bees a few months back. needless to say it hurt.
how awful, besides painful, it must have been scary!
it was, they we are absolutely furious with me for some reason.
label: furious
response: were you messing with them, maybe? or taking their honey?

situation: when i play old games i get nostalgic.
dialogue: do you remember the old video games you used to play?
i do, as if it were yesterday. i remember most of my childhood through video games.
the nostalgic moments when you play them again is brilliant. you should try it.
label: nostalgic
response: i really want to, but unfortunately my gamecube and n64 no longer function. also a few of my favorite games are scratched to heck.

situation: now that everything is falling into place in life, i feel very hopeful about the future.
dialogue: life seems to be going perfect right now, how about you?
i am glad to hear that! things are really going great for me too!
well that is even better news! i am feeling hopeful for the both of us.
label: hopeful
response: same here. let's hope these good times stick around real long!

situation: i gave a house key to a girl i had went on 2 dates with.
dialogue: a girl i went on two dates with wanted a copy of my house key, yikes!
you barely even know her, what was she thinking?
i do not know, she said she needed a place to hang out between jobs. stupid me actually gave it to her.
label: trusting
response: i really hope she does not do anything bad to you. you seem like a nice dude.

situation: yesterday i was disappointed when my girlfriend forgot to order the chinese.
dialogue: my girlfriend forgot to order the chinese food yesterday.
so what happened? did you end up ordering some once you both remembered?
was annoyed and disappointed so i ended up having a sandwich instead. bad times.
label: disappointed
response: people make mistakes, it happens.

situation: my dog puked on the carpet a few weeks ago, it was disgusting.
dialogue: my dog puked all over the carpet a few weeks back.
oh nasty! that must have been a heck of a pain to clean.
was absolutely disgusting but luckily it did come out easy.
label: disgusted
response: i would not have thought it would be so easy, that is good!

situation: i found my cat dead on the side of the road. i was so hurt and distraught i could not even drive home
dialogue: the other night i found my cat laying dead in the side of the road
i am so sorry for your loss, it is not easy losing a pet. how are you doing?
it is tough. i was crying so hard that i had to call my husband to come pick us up
label: devastated
response: understandably so. i hope you feel better soon.

situation: i went to an underground cave recently, i was pretty nervous and wanted to back out a few times.
dialogue: my family dragged me along to visit an underground cave recently, i was pretty nervous.
sounds pretty interesting.  how was it? did you like it?
it was nice, after i got over the fear from being 23 stories underground.
label: apprehensive
response: wow, that much!   were you afraid to be trapped like those poor boys in thailand?

situation: i felt really anxious about my job interview back in september.
dialogue: had a job interview the other day.
how did that go?
i think it went alright, i was incredibly anxious about it.
label: anxious
response: those always make me nervous too. i hope it goes well for you!

situation: i feel guilty for eating my housemates last chocolate bar.
dialogue: ate my flatmates last chocolate bar earlier.
well, i hope they said you could have it.
nope, i do feel a bit guilty about it but they should have hid it better.
label: guilty
response: you could always replace it for them since you know you should not have taken it.

situation: my friends wanted to go bungie jumping but i am afraid of heights.  they kept trying to convince me to do it but i was reluctant.  finally i stepped out on the ledge and jumped.
dialogue: i went bungie jumping with some friends but i was reluctant to jump.
are you scared of heights?
yes, i do not like heights at all. i did eventually muster the courage to jump, however.
label: apprehensive
response: i bet that was the ride of your life.

situation: i always try to tell my kids to show kindness and understanding to others. it is hard when they go to school and other kids are mean to them and bully others. i hope those values stick with them always
dialogue: i always try to tell my kids they need to be kind and understanding to others, no matter what.
i think those are very important lessons. do they always listen?
they try but it is hard when there are so many bullies at school. i wish other parents would try to do the same.
label: caring
response: i am a parent and i wish the exact same thing.

situation: i was impressed with the amount of work that goes into video games.
dialogue: do you know how much work goes into video games?
not entirely, but i do know depending on the game it can take hundreds of people.
i was really impressed as some games it can take over 10 years.
label: impressed
response: as a gamer, i would love to know more about the games that take that long to make. which ones?

situation: a girl i used to date asked me to come and visit her for a one night stand, i am in a relationship though, i said no.
dialogue: an old girlfriend contacted me looking for a one night stand, i had to decline.
oh man! i hate one night stands!
hah, they can be fun. though my partner would not have appreciated it!
label: faithful
response: oh. yeah. probably not haha.

situation: i went to a family reunion at my grandparents' house, which i hadn't been to in many years.  i visited with all my relatives and it brought up all sorts of memories from when i was a child.
dialogue: i went to a family reunion at my grandparents' house.
that sounds like fun, how was it?
it was enjoyable for sure, and poignant too.  it brought up lots of memories of my childhood.
label: sentimental
response: i bet!  when i got to family reunions there is always so much reminiscing

situation: i had been the initial buyer in a ice juice. even though they were having some bad press, i still did not want to sell out and cut my losses. i wanted to keep the course
dialogue: i had a chance to sell my stake in ice juice for a nice little profit.
ooh, did you go ahead and go through with it?
no, i want to keep it because i have faith in the company doing really well longterm.
label: faithful
response: nice, that is a good idea. good luck!

situation: my daughters first day of kindergarten was this week, i walked her in and watched her for a bit, shes growing up so fast.
dialogue: my daughter started kindergarten recently, i walked her in and met her teacher.
was she nice?
very nice, i just cannot believe how grown up my little girl is getting.
label: caring
response: how old is she?

situation: i gave my brother 200 dollars to buy some cryptokitties. i know he is good for it and that he will pay me back.
dialogue: i lent my brother 200 dollars so he could buy cryptokitties.
may i ask what a cryptokitty is? i am unfamiliar.
i really could not tell you some kind of digital cat, he says he will pay me back, so hopefully it all works out.
label: trusting
response: does he ask for money a lot or is this a first?

situation: everyone wanted to go skydiving. but i was pretty sure my chute would not release and i would plunge to the ground.
dialogue: everyone wanted to go skydiving for my birthday.
do you like skydiving?  i would be terrified!
i am pretty sure that my greatest fear is my chute not releasing and plunging through the sky into the ground. oh well you only live once.
label: apprehensive
response: haha, that is true but you can also live with your feet on the ground!

situation: i did not notice that i had a sock stuck to the back of my shirt all day!
dialogue: i did not notice but i was walking around all day with a sock on my shirt!
haha that is hilarious! where was it at on your shirt?
on my back! i went to work like this!
label: embarrassed
response: oh no! i hope your coworkers went easy on you about it. you must've had a lot of static electricity.

situation: someone had pull a stick prank on me and slashed my car tires and bashed my windshield in at my apartment complex.
dialogue: someone decided to slash my car tires, key my car, and bash in my windshield.
how awful!  do you know who did it?
probably a spurned former lover. glad i had insurance.
label: devastated
response: yes at least there is that.  but it must be really scary to deal with someone willing to go that far.

situation: i have to give a speech at my fathers funeral. i need to make sure the speech goes perfectly, i cannot mess up infront of my family.
dialogue: i have to give a speech at my fathers funeral. i drew the short straw.
it must have been a very difficult  speech, specially since i imagine you were really sad and moved.
not really, i just needed to make sure that it goes off without a hitch. i do not want to embarrass my mother.
label: caring
response: of course,  do you feel prepared to do it then?

situation: i have been at my same job for 12 years
dialogue: i have been working at my same job for 12 years.
wow. that is quite the feat nowadays. do you still enjoy it?
yes i do.  its a fun job.
label: faithful
response: is it a "never worked a day in your life" situation?

situation: i recently had a flight delayed by several hours and i was really afraid it was going to be cancelled altogether.
dialogue: on a recent trip there was some bad weather that caused my flight to be delayed several hours. it was already late so i was afraid they would cancel the flight altogether.
that is no good!  did you manage to get on it?
yes! thank goodness. they did not cancel. i just got home much later than i had hoped.
label: apprehensive
response: that is lucky.  at least you made it home the same day.

situation: i ate at an all you can eat chinese buffet. literally felt so close to exploding. i ended up going home and falling into a deep slumber.
dialogue: i literally ate all you could eat at a chinese buffet
lol, i bet you could not move after that.
i had to go home and lie down for the greatest nap of my life.
label: content
response: i bet, although with chinese you can eat it again in an hour or so.

situation: recently went on a family vacation to an old spot we used to go when we were all younger. it was nice to see old stuff and talk about old times.
dialogue: recently went on a family vacation to an old spot we used to go when we were all younger. it was nice to see old stuff and talk about old times.
sounds very nice, you must have felt nostalgic for the old times, right?
oh for sure. i am always a sucker for nostalgia.
label: sentimental
response: yes me too, it is for that reason i avoid looking and old pictures when i do not want to go that way.

situation: i got a call in the middle of the night during college that one of my best friends had been in a fatal car crash.
dialogue: one night during college i got a phone call in the middle of the night that one of my best friends had been killed in a car wreck.
that sounds terrible! you must have been devastated!
absolutely. it was really the first time i had lost someone close to me, family or friend.
label: devastated
response: it was a terrible way to comes to term with dead, i am so sorry you have to go through that.  i hope time have healed you.

situation: for my birthday, my partner had the wait staff sing to me, it was awkward to say the least.
dialogue: my birthday was a few days ago, i cannot believe my wife had the wait staff sing to me.
i love when i am at a restaurant and that happens. happy birthday, by the way!
hah, its good entertainment, but i do not exactly enjoy being in the spotlight. thanks!
label: embarrassed
response: everyone always looks so happy and it makes people around you happy, but i understand not wanting to be in the spotlight

situation: my husband and i recently got married. this is our second marriage each and it is nice that we are both at a place in our lives where we are happy with things just the way they are.
dialogue: i recently got married and i am so lucky to have found someone who enjoys doing the same things that i do.
congrats! it is nice to find someone with things in common. shared interests can be fun.
thank you. it is nice. this is a second marriage for us both and i like that we are both happy with things just the way they are, no high expectations
label: content
response: i am on my 2nd as well. i like to think that we will do things more wisely the second time around. best of luck to you both!

situation: i lost my wallet and trusted to have it turned in
dialogue: i lost my wallet last week
oh that is the worse.  dis you find it at any point?
my friend freaked out but i was pretty sure i left it at a restaurant and i trusted in my fellow humans to turn it in
label: trusting
response: and who was right in this case?  dis anyone turned it in?

situation: i recently helped prepare food at my local second harvest food bank for some underprivileged folks.
dialogue: i recently had the opportunity to help out at my local second harvest food bank.
that is so sweet of you! how was your experience?
it was great. i was with a good group of people too. we made it fun.
label: caring
response: i bet it feels good to know that you are helping those in need, too!

situation: everyday i go to a job i enjoy and come home to a wife i love. my life is in a good spot right now.
dialogue: i am happily married and employed, life is in a pretty good spot right now.
that is awesome, having a significant other and a good job can make a huge difference!
for sure. i have had some unstable times in my life. i am thankful to be where i am now.
label: content
response: those times can help shape you and make you appreciate the good times even more!

situation: yesterday my car ran out of oil and broke down. i could not believe i would let such a thing happen!
dialogue: yesterday my car ran out of oil and broke down. i could not believe i would let such a thing happen!
oh no! did it do any meaningful damage?
the engine is totally shot, its not designed to run without any. so now i have to go shopping for a new car.
label: ashamed
response: ouch. new car is cheaper than replacing the engine?

situation: i was walking down the sidewalk of a busy street and caught my foot on a root and went face first into a big flower bed.
dialogue: i was in a big party city and the street was crowded with people. as i was walking my foot got tangled up on something and i went face first into a huge flower bed.
ouch! that must have hurt.
it hurt my pride more than it hurt my face.
label: embarrassed
response: do not worry, people will not remember within a few months.

situation: i am sitting here waiting on something expensive i ordered online. it should be on my doorstep any second. need it for this weekend.
dialogue: literally anytime i order something online and i get the tracking i immediately start checking it. i am so impatient waiting on stuff to come.
yes i know i am like that too, i cannot wait for my new stuff to arrive, i feel like a child on christmas waiting for santa's gifts.
yes. every single time. i know better. but i just cannot help myself but to check over and over
label: anticipating
response: i guess it is kind of fun anticipating the arrival of the packages.

situation: my dog died about this time last year and i miss her
dialogue: my dog died of old age last year and i miss her
how sad to lose a dog you love! ta least she/he died of old age, she must be in doggy heaven.
yes.  she was the most wonderful dog ever
label: sentimental
response: i know how you feel, there must be two of them though, because my dog is the most wonderful dog ever too!

situation: this weekend the family is going to go swimming at the lake, might rent a boat, looking forward to it.
dialogue: i am gonna take the family out to the lake this weekend, we might rent a boat.
that sounds like a great way to spend the weekend.  what type of boat are you thinking about renting?
maybe a pontoon boat, depends on what they have. should be a nice way to unwind.
label: anticipating
response: absolutely, nothing like unwinding after the work week.  i hope you'

situation: a friend of mine has a lot of money and seems to get anything she wants anytime she wants without working.
dialogue: i have a friend with loaded parents. she does not work but has anything she wants anytime she wants.
wow, must be nice. my parents were really poor- still are.
mine are not poor but they are not loaded. they struggle. same for me. i work my butt of for what i have.
label: jealous
response: yeah me too. i like that though, i like earning my way.

situation: i finally finished a project i had been working on at work. it took a lot of learning along the way and i am ready to tackle another.
dialogue: i had to do a lot of learning to knock out a big project at work. finally finished and ready for another.
hey, good for you! that takes stamina. what was the project?
for sure. it was a software coding project for a client. a lot of which i did not understand at the start.
label: confident
response: well done! that was a challenge.

situation: i have alot of health problems and because of that see many different specialist.  i have been able to find some amazing doctors and i have to often times put complete faith in them because my life is in their hands
dialogue: i have many health problems that require me to see many different speccialist
that is awful!  will you be feeling better any time soon?
i am working towards that.i have been lucky to find some great doctors which i am able to put faith in because my life is essentially in their hands
label: trusting
response: i am so glad you have doctors that you can trust!

situation: i felt bad when i cheated on my diet. i found out i gained 2 pounds this past week!
dialogue: i had a super stressful week and ended up cheating on my diet last night by eating pizza and cake.
uhoh. hopefully you were able to stick to your diet throughout the week, though. one off day ain't so bad.
yes, otherwise i had stuck to it but my weekly weigh in was this morning and i was up two pounds. i felt so irritated!
label: ashamed
response: that sounds it. as long as you keep with it though, results have to happen. the hardest part of dieting has got to be the hiccups, anyway.

situation: i am a bit nervous- i have an upcoming certification exam to take for my teaching license and it is a big deal.
dialogue: i am a bit nervous- i have an upcoming certification exam to take for my teaching license and it is a big deal.
that is an amazing accomplishment!  i am sure you will do great!  have you been studying a lot?
i have been studying a whole lot so i think i will do okay, but it is still making me feel nervous.
label: apprehensive
response: i hope you can stay calm, you seem really well prepared!

situation: there was a group project due and we had a meeting, but i missed it because it was my 21st birthday
dialogue: there was a group project due and we had a meeting, but i missed it because it was my 21st birthday. was not my best day
oh no,that did not go welll,so sorry about that
yeah, but i learnt from it and also had a good birthday!
label: ashamed
response: that is good dear,congratulations

situation: i have many health problems but i am so lucky to have a great support system from my family.  it is wonderful to know how much they love me!
dialogue: i have many health problems but i feel so lucky to have a great support system in my family
it is very important to have a good support system with health issues, especially if there are many. it helps to know that you have people that are there if you need them.
it really is!  it is wonderful to know how much they love me!
label: caring
response: health problems can have a devastating effect on a person if they are alone, so it is wonderful that you have love and support.

situation: i was devastated when my dog died
dialogue: i was so sad when i had to put my dog down last year
oh. i am sorry. how old was your dog?
she was 12.  it was old age but it was so hard because i had had her for years.
label: devastated
response: have you thought about getting another dog?

situation: i wanted to buy a new car, but i was not sure about buying the one i got.
dialogue: i wanted to buy a new car, but i was not sure about buying the one i got.
it is a hard decision, you can be apprehensive about making the right decision you know?
yeah, it is been a good car so far, but most cars are pretty reliable at first.
label: apprehensive
response: yeah they are! so that is really good!

situation: i have an amazing husband who is always there for me no matter what.  he makes me feel so loved and i cannot imagine life without him.
dialogue: i have an amazing husband who is always there for me no matter what
that sounds amazing! how'd you guys meet?
he was my sisters, husbands roomate in college and he came down for their wedding and we met there.  i cannot imagine my life without him
label: content
response: oh wow, that is awesome. is your sister as happy with her husband as you are with yours?

situation: there was this one time when i went to my friends 16th party.  when i was walking in her house i ran smack dab into their glass door.  it was so clean that i did not see it.  i was mortified and the funny part is that i one a door prize later that evening
dialogue: one time i went to my friends 16th birthday party.  when i was walking in her house i ran smack into their glass door.  it was so clean that i did not see it.
did you hurt yourself?
lol.just my pride.  i was mortified and the funny part is that later on i won the door prize
label: embarrassed
response: hahahah!  i am dying!  i am glad you were not hurt.

situation: my husband and i are planning a big trip to washington, dc.  i love history and i cannot wait till we get to go
dialogue: my husband and i are planning a big trip to washington,dc
oh, that sounds so exciting! what do you plan to see while you are there?
i really want to go to the smithsonian.  i love history and cannot wait till we get to go
label: anticipating
response: the smithsonian would be amazing. i have not been to dc yet. i hope you guys have a great time!

situation: i have this knife that i carry everyday. my dad gave it to me before he died.
dialogue: i have this knife that i carry everyday. my dad gave it to me before he died.
oh that is really nice to have something you can remember him by. it must be very special to you.
it is, it is like he is always with me.
label: sentimental
response: that is very sweet. i am certain he is with you.

situation: i have many health problems that have prevented me from having children.  i use to be so upset everytime i saw people with children but now i have learned to be content in my situtation
dialogue: i have many health problems that have prevented me from having children
oh my. i am so sorry. that must be so difficult. are you exploring any other options like adoption?
if i can get my health under control i would definetly look into that.  i use to be very sad everytime i saw people with their children but i have finally learned to be content in my situation
label: jealous
response: i hope you are able to have a child some day. i truly hurt for anyone that struggles in situations like this. i have to aplogize in advance. the topic i chose was about my daughter. i do not want to make you feel sad.

situation: i had a job interview one time that was very important for me! i prepared as best i could and wen!t in to the interview feeling great about it.  i truly felt i would ace it
dialogue: i had a job interview that was very important to me once
did you go for the interview?
yes, i prepared as best i could and i really felt that i aced it!  sure enough i ended up getting the jon
label: confident
response: that is lovely,congrats

situation: living out of a car
dialogue: i used to live out of my car and it made me feel pretty down on myself back then
i no how you feei i have had to live in worse places than that , but it looks like you found a way out of that situation.
what types of situations? and yeah it could have been worse but i am glad i am out of it.
label: ashamed
response: i had to squat in houses before. i am glad things have changed for you and for me.

situation: skydiving made me give in and let go.
dialogue: skydiving taught me how to let go and stop trying to fix everything
wow. that is amazing. were you afraid to try it?
yeah the hardest part for me was just realizing that i would not be in control, but it was very natural in the end
label: trusting
response: do you often feel like you want to be in control? cause i totally do.

situation: i ended up watching all the robin williams movies i could think of last week end. it was a lot of good memories.
dialogue: i ended up watching all the robin william movies i could think of last weekend.
lol! which one was your favorite?
i do not know if there is one of my favorites, but it sure was a lot of good memories.
label: sentimental
response: did you watch mrs. doubtfire?

situation: i was in a rush this morning and did not realize i had put on two different colored sox. it was really embarrassing and i hope no one noticed.
dialogue: i was in a rush this morning and did not realize i had put on two different colored sox.
i hate it when that happens. i hope your pants covered them at least.
one was pink the other was green. i hope no one noticed.
label: embarrassed
response: that would be embarrassing!

situation: i had been working on my dance moves for the last 6 months. i am finally ready for my first dance off, i will win this.
dialogue: i have been working on my dance moves for the last 6 months.
oh really? that is cool! what style of dance?
well its for a dance off, so it is a pretty big deal i have to win this.
label: confident
response: wow. that is so amazing. are you nervous?

situation: did not realize my pants fell down in public
dialogue: this one time my pants fell down in public, but i was really tired so i did not realize
oh my gosh! when did you figure it out?!
a couple minutes later
label: embarrassed
response: wow i am so sorry. were you a kid?

situation: going to a job interview had me looking forward to it
dialogue: going in for an interview had me wondering what would happen
yeah it can get pretty intense! how did it go?
i decided not to take the job in the end, i guess i just wanted to know i could get it
label: anticipating
response: wow, going out in style! well i hope you found a good job somewhere.

situation: thinking about where i started
dialogue: i appreciate the place where i started cuz it helps me keep going
like where you were born?
for sure, it reminds me that things are always getting better
label: sentimental
response: was it a rough place to grow up?

situation: i have been working out at the track to get my sprint times up. but my 100 yard dash still takes over 6 seconds i am so slow.
dialogue: i have been working on at the track to get my sprint times faster1
wow that is awesome! are you on a team?
no, just me, but my 100 yard dash is so so slow, i cannot even get lower than 6 seconds.
label: ashamed
response: i do not know what is good for sprints, i am more of a distance runner myself.

situation: i busted out some sets today
dialogue: drinking a gallon of milk everyday makes me feel like an absolute madman in the gym who's gonna take over the world
that does not sound healthy. does it ever make you sick?
that is not the point, gotta do it raw
label: confident
response: are you drinking 2% because you think you are fat? because you are not. you could drink whole if you wanted to.

situation: i was at the gym doing some close grip bench presses and it felt so easy
dialogue: i had this juicy pump at the gym from doing some benching and it felt too easy
what. i am confused. what is a juicy pump. like a juicer?
my pecs were poppin
label: prepared
response: oh. hahahahahaha. you go!

situation: i was trying to hurry around the house. while i was not paying attention fully my foot struck against my dogs toys and stubbed my toe.
dialogue: i was hurrying around the house and was not paying attention fully, i ending up hitting my toe on my dogs toys.
dang dogs leaving their things around!
it really hurt, i think i may need to take all his toys away to punish him.
label: furious
response: yeah, minus one for dogs

situation: when i saw my main chick texting other dudes
dialogue: i was at my main girls house and i saw these texts from this guy named chad
that does not sound good, sounds like you are getting replaced.
yeah, i demoted her to my dinner girl, now i gotta choose who my main ting is gonna be
label: jealous
response: maybe you should just go single for a while and enjoy freedom.

situation: i could not finish my plate
dialogue: i got mad because i was too full to finish my plate at the buffet
what kind of buffet? did you get to take a doggie bag at least?
chinese, but no i decided not to, do not think would allow it
label: furious
response: i bet you wish you had that doggie bag now. my mom used to sneek food out.

situation: i spent 20 dollars on a piece of cheese cake, i thought it would blow my mind but it was dry and barely editable. talk about a let down.
dialogue: i spent 20 dollars on a piece of cheese cake.
oh my, i hope it was delicious, that is a lot of money
i thought it would blow my mind but it was dry and really disappointing. talk about a let down.
label: disappointed
response: goodness, i would be so upset, that is a terrible experience!

situation: i have been working on my bench press for 6 months, i am trying to get up to benching 400 pounds. i know i can do it.
dialogue: i have been working on my bench press for 6 months, i know i can get to bench 400 pounds.
nice, what program are you running
steak and maximum effort. i also drink lots of water, i am on the next level like arnold.
label: hopeful
response: good game m8, pics or it did not happen

situation: felt scared while i was watching paranormal activity
dialogue: paranormal activity is the scariest movie of horror movies
really? i do not find it that scary maybe you just have not seen true terror.
yeah you will have to show me sometime
label: terrified
response: i have a chucky doll sitting in the chair next to me and it looks at me all day. now that is a movie.

situation: i just gave up smoking cigarettes. it was pretty hard but the worst part is how everything puts you on edge and it is hard to relax.
dialogue: i just gave up smoking cigarettes. it was pretty hard, but the worst part is how everything puts you on edge and it is hard to relax.
oh wow, i wish i could find the courage to do that, it surely takes a lot of will power. how did you do it
i closed my eyes and visualize a world where anything was possible. i called this world imagination land.
label: anxious
response: i will totally have to try that, it really is difficult to stop smoking!

situation: i was challenged to a dare by my best friend. i had to spend the night in a cometary with no flashlights or tents just a rolled up sleeping bag.
dialogue: i was challenged to a dare by my best friend!
did you have the choice between truth and dare?
no, the challenge was i had to spend the night in a cemetery. no flashlight no tents just a rolled up sleeping bag.
label: terrified
response: dang, street cred off the chains right there

situation: getting a lot of projects done in a day
dialogue: i enjoy getting things done
what kind of things do you like to do?
i like to crochet and pay the bills
label: hopeful
response: why do you like to pay the bills, maybe you should just get a rich girl or guy to take care of it.

situation: when i got out of the gym today
dialogue: i was so satisfied with myself when i left the gym today
did you have a good workout?
indeed, it was quite thrilling, did a little chest workout, got a nice pump
label: impressed
response: nice!  i really need to get back to the gym.

situation: my cat puked all over my roommates shoes. i feel so bad.
dialogue: my cat puked all over my roommates shoes. i feel so bad.
oh, that is terrible!  what did you do?
i clean them up as best i could, and told him about it. then i profusely apologized.
label: ashamed
response: did you figure out what made your cat puke?

situation: i was really sick the other day and i let my roommate pick me up and carry me down the stairs.
dialogue: i was really sick the other day and i let my roommate pick me up and carry me down the stairs.
oh no! what was wrong? are you feeling better?
i had an ovarian cyst, it hurt so bad. i almost went to the er again.
label: trusting
response: oh man! i had one when i was pregnant with my son. i feel your pain!

situation: i was going through my photos today and i saw a picture of me and my ex together. it just made me feel odd , i miss him.
dialogue: i was going through my photos today and i saw a picture of me and my ex together. it just made me feel odd, i miss him.
nice, when did you guys break up
we broke up back in may, he was just too much of a workaholic.
label: sentimental
response: i see, you will find someone better

situation: when i was crying myself to sleep
dialogue: i get pretty sad some nights, but it feels good to cry sometimes
oh, why are you crying? is anything wrong in particular? have you talked to somebody?
yeah, sometimes it is like a deep sadness comes out of nowhere
label: sad
response: oh i am sorry, i hope you get the help that you need.

situation: i had just been returning home from work. on the side of the road there looked to be what used to be a deer. it was decaying and i could almost smell it.
dialogue: i had just been returning home, and on the side of the road there was some roadkill. it used to be a deer.
oh no. that is quite unfortunate for the deer. did you just drive past it?
yeah but my widows were down, and i could almost taste the stench of decay.
label: disgusted
response: i am sure you wanted to get out of there as soon as possible.

situation: eating food is hard.
dialogue: sometimes it is impossible to shove more food down my gullet
do you have a medical condition?
nah, i am trying to gain some pounds, i just have not acclimated to the quantity yet
label: angry
response: are you trying to gain muscle?

situation: hearing jfk's we will go to the moon speech.
dialogue: i just watched jfk's speech, 'we will go to the moon' reminds me of what i admire in the us
i love the usa.
it is really moving, wonder what the next big goal will be for humanity
label: proud
response: jfk's speeches were amazing.  we have had a lot of great leaders in our country.  our country has truly been blessed.

situation: the litter of puppies had been born. all of the puppies have survived, such a lucky amazing occasion.
dialogue: the litter of puppies had been born!
nice, amazing to witness birth
all of the puppies survived, truly a lucky amazing occasion!
label: joyful
response: good to hear, have fun with puppies!

situation: easter when my dad had the whole yard covered with eggs
dialogue: i was totally caught off guard as a kid when the entire yard was covered in easter eggs
wow, who was the won who littered your yard with easter eggs?
my dad, but he would not admit it! haha
label: surprised
response: nice, he probably made you pick them all up too!

situation: eating a bunch of garlic made me sort of tentative
dialogue: i was a little nervous to eat some cloves of garlic for the first time
what made you nervous about it?
i was not sure if it was going to make me sick or not
label: apprehensive
response: i see. is it your favorite food now? :p

situation: i borrowed a book from a friend and left it outside. it got ruined by the rain.
dialogue: i accidentally left a book i borrowed from a friend outside
were you able to get it back?
i did but it was ruined from the rain.
label: ashamed
response: well, hopefully your friend will forgive you.

situation: i forgot to take some water bottles out from under my cart. i left with my groceries and ended up just taking the bottles and realized i did not pay later
dialogue: i forgot to take some water bottles out from under my cart and pay for them at the store. i did not realize i did not pay for them till later.
oh no! i have done that before too
hopefully i do not get bad karma for my accidental theft!
label: guilty
response: i hope not too!

situation: i was attending a ball, and one girl in particular had the most stunning dress. it looked like little diamonds had been stitched on every inch of her dress.
dialogue: i attended a ball recently, one of the girls had the most stunning dress.
a ball, how fancy! was the girl as stunning as her dress?
no way, her dress looked like little diamonds had been stitched on every inch of her dress. not many girls can compete with that. diamonds are forever.
label: impressed
response: yeah, i  can see a dress like that can easily outshine any girl. the dress sounds amazing though.

situation: i hadn't been to the dentist in years but one day i made an appointment. one of my teeth had been bothering me a lot
dialogue: i had to schedule an appointment with the dentist after not visiting one in five years.
that is crazy. did you not have insurance for all these years you missed the dentist appointments?
i do not have insurance. i went anyway because i had a problem with one tooth.
label: apprehensive
response: i hope the problem was not deep in the enamel of the tooth since that requires a lot of work.

situation: i am glad to have the internet to teach me things i need
dialogue: the internet has been there through thick and thin for me
the internet is a great thing. i do not know what we'd do without it.
true, it is a great resource to have
label: faithful
response: we had an issue with our internet for a couple of days and it was so inconvenient!

situation: seeing animals sleeping is calming,
dialogue: seeing animals sleep is very relaxing
i have never felt that way myself. what do you find relaxing about watching animals sleep?
i do not know, i guess i am just tired
label: content
response: i suppose when you feel tired, anything can feel relaxing

situation: one time my dog got run over by a car. he had been playing outside with my brother and his friends.
dialogue: my dog got hit by a car.
really? i am so sorry to hear that
yeah. he did not survive. i really miss him
label: devastated
response: hope everything gets better soon

situation: watching kids makes me remember the good old days
dialogue: i remember not having any responsibilities as a kid
me too, i really miss those days.
yea, those were the days
label: sentimental
response: if only time machines were real.

situation: one time i found a photo album of pictures from my childhood. looking at it really brought back memories
dialogue: i found an old photo album of my family. it really brought back memories.
it is good to remember days gone by
it is kind of a bittersweet experience
label: sentimental
response: yea, like you can remember those times but things are different

situation: one time i got my grades back after a difficult semester in college. i got all a's.
dialogue: i had a tough semester but i just saw my grades and i am pleased with the results.
taht is always a weight off the shoulders, i am glad you are pleased.
yeah, it was a huge relief for me. i am so glad to be done with this semester.
label: content
response: i remember that feeling, finals week is so stressful, then there is that wave of relief.

situation: i was secure in knowing that my daughter would drive safely in my car
dialogue: i should not have been so quick to let my teen take the car, but she was so excited.
did her drive turn out alright?
well, let me just say that the pole made it out alright,lol.
label: trusting
response: oh no! is your daughter okay?

situation: always looking forward to the gym
dialogue: after a gym workout i am always ready to get back and hit a new pr
that is great! what motivates you?
i think just knowing that one day i will be able to do things that are unimaginable right now, and i know i can do better the next time
label: anticipating
response: wow that is so motivating, thanks for that i really needed to hear that

situation: one time my stomach made a loud noise while i was taking a test. everyone thinks i cut the cheese
dialogue: my stomach made a loud noise while i was in class taking a test
oh that is weird what did you do?
i just pretended like nothing happened, but i am worried everyone thinks it was something other than my stomach
label: embarrassed
response: no no, dont

situation: leaving the gym
dialogue: i felt pretty good leaving the gym today, hit a new pr on overhead press
that is great. you must have been working really hard.
i like to try my hardest!
label: confident
response: and it has paid off. good for you.

situation: after meditating i felt ready
dialogue: i felt like i could do anything after i finished meditating
nice! how long do you meditate for?
i try to go longer everyday, i was able to go 50 minutes yesterday
label: prepared
response: dang! well i hope you have a stress-free weekend and be full of energy!

situation: one day i found out that my boyfriend was texting his ex-girlfriend. i think he likes her more than he likes me
dialogue: i caught my boyfriend texting his ex
wow. dump him and beat him up!
i think he will dump me soon. he would rather be with her, i just know it
label: jealous
response: that is unfortunate, he is a scumbag. i hope you find yourself a nice and wealthy boyfriend!

situation: i just figured out how to consistently generate high quality serves in tennis. my friend has been working with me on the weekends to get the right motion and power down.
dialogue: my friend has been working with me on the weekends to get my tennis game on the next level.
tennis, how fun! have you noticed improvement?
yeah i can consistently serve with power and accuracy now. i feel almost decent now.
label: grateful
response: that is magnificent! i have never played tennis myself, but it is a sport i have always enjoyed watching.

situation: ex partner was being dishonest.
dialogue: a while back i caught my partner at the time being dishonest to me.
that is to bad, is it someone you have been with a long time?
we were together for a year and a half and we had a child together shortly before i found out!
label: ashamed
response: wow, that is really messed up. did you end up leaving them?

situation: remembering the high school days brings back memories
dialogue: high school was a great time, but those days are long gone
also nostalgic ey? i get you, those easy days, no stress, no limits, anything is possible
no bills to pay, going out to eat with friends all the time, pretty fun
label: nostalgic
response: i wish we could go back to those days..

situation: getting back into the swing of things after major surgery
dialogue: around 4 months ago, i had major surgery that caused me to be immobile for a few weeks.
i am so sorry you had to go through that! what happened?
well, i had lots of support from my family, but i felt afraid of getting back into the swing of things for fear of failing. i felt so vulnerable.
label: apprehensive
response: i am sure it was a very difficult experience. you must be a really strong person to have gotten through that.

situation: i can feel myself getting better everyday
dialogue: i love going to the gym because i feel stronger
nice! how long do you go to the gym for?
probably half a year, been the most consistent in my life, how about you?
label: hopeful
response: i never even leave the house! i am the opposite of you!

situation: when my parents did not listen to me
dialogue: it is tough to talk to my parents, but i try to talk about things we do not disagree on
that is unfortunate, what do you usually avoid talking about?
anything political or religious really, or relationships
label: disappointed
response: well i hope one day your parents are more accepting!

situation: when my dog died.
dialogue: i had my dog for 13 years before she passed away last year from cancer. it was devastating!
oh no i am so sorry to hear that. are you planning on getting  a new dog?
probably not for a while. she was a great companion, but i do not think my heart is ready to bring in a new dog quite yet.
label: devastated
response: aww, yeah i know what you mean. dogs are so lovable. i also have a new pup myself. i got him a couple years ago

situation: even though someone wronged me, i still care about their well being
dialogue: i was horribly wronged by someone i thought i could trust. the feeling was devastating, and i have always struggled with forgiveness.
oh my, what happened? i am so sorry, no one should treat anyone they care about poorly.
they were dishonest and physically cruel. we have gone our separate ways, but i truly hope they can learn to treat others better.
label: caring
response: i am sorry hun, you deserve to be treated better than that. i hope you know that.

situation: last month i came home from work and noticed my cat was not feeling well, so i rushed her to the vet. i had to put her down.
dialogue: last month i came home from work and noticed my cat was not feeling well, so i rushed her to the vet. i had to put her down.
i am so sorry, that is the worst feelings. i had to put my dog down as well. i know you did the right thing.
i know, i just really miss her. poor cancer kitty. i loved her so much.
label: devastated
response: cats are really some of the greatest companions. how old did she live?

situation: my roommate got a new cat last week, and we finally let them meet today. i was so nervous and worried about it.
dialogue: my roommate got a new cat last week, and we finally let them meet today. i was so nervous and worried about it.
how did it go?
it went okay. my cat bopped him a little and growled a lot but no real swipes. so better than expected i guess.
label: apprehensive
response: that is good some things just take time

situation: high risk pregnancy
dialogue: when i was pregnant with my first born, it was considered a high risk pregnancy. it made me very worried and anxious throughout.
i can imagine. how did things turn out?
i had to have emergency surgery in the end, but being able to hold my healthy baby was the greatest blessing i could have asked for.
label: faithful
response: i am so glad you made it through

situation: summer classes are over!
dialogue: i am so happy summer classes are officially over and i will be able to relax for a week!
great what will you be doing during your time off ?
i am not even sure what to do with all this time! i guess i should relax or have some leisure time, but everything in me says to try and be productive even on break. it is that school mentality.
label: content
response: i agree with you,you will feel good about yourself being productive !

situation: partner chewing loudly at a formal meeting.
dialogue: my sister came to visit from out of state. it was the first time we have seen her in nearly a decade!
that must have been exciting to see her after so long. does she live very far away?
yes she lives on the other side of the country. we had a nice dinner, but my boyfriend is a loud chewer and a sloppy eater. it was quite embarrassing!
label: embarrassed
response: that is a shame. does your sister have a bad impression of your boyfriend after having dinner with you?

situation: one time i bought a new dress. it looked really good on me and i could not wait to wear it to the party that weekend.
dialogue: i just bought a new dress and i cannot wait to wear it this weekend.
i love buying new clothes! where do you think you will wear it to?
i am going to wear it to a party. everyone will have their eyes on me!
label: confident
response: how exciting! i bet you will look flawless!

situation: running uphill miles.
dialogue: a few months ago i could barely walk up a flight of stairs without having to catch my breath, but i bit the bullet and have been training.
how has that been going for you?
wonderful! it is definitely hard work, but i continue on, even on the days i do not want to. today i discovered i can now comfortably run an uphill mile and i feel very confident!
label: confident
response: that is amazing!

situation: one time i was offered a job opportunity. i had to wait several days to hear if i got it.
dialogue: my boss told me about a potential job opportunity and i have been waiting to hear if it is going to happen
nervous?
a little bit. i am mostly excited about it though
label: anticipating
response: that is good! excitement and nervousness are both the same, so it is very hard to tell, but it is amazing you are able to convert all the bad feelings into positive ones! good luck

situation: prepared for my final.
dialogue: i was very prepared for my final exam. it was so easy.
that is a great feeling. going in knowing you will do well, and then actually doing well.
if i am being honest, i made an answer key from the quizzes we took this semester. as they say, work smart, not hard.
label: prepared
response: ingenuity like that will reward you in the real world. academia is a system, and if you game it, you've won.

situation: cousin carelessy broke my hammock
dialogue: my cousin was swinging recklessly on my hammock and ended up breaking it!
oh no! i would be very furuios!
i was very upset, especially considering how long it took me to get it set up. i loved laying in my peaceful hammock to read.
label: furious
response: i would be devastated! maybe he will not do it agian.

situation: phone call from an old friend.
dialogue: i received a phone call the other day from a friend i hadn't heard from in ages.
oh wow, i bet that was nice. hopefully y'all had a good talk.
we reminisced about old times. it was very nice, indeed. it was nice hearing from him, especially during some rough times!
label: nostalgic
response: well, that is fantastic. hopefully y'all will be able to meet up in the future real soon too.

situation: i have a weekend of nothing but relaxation planned for this weekend.
dialogue: i have a weekend of nothing but relaxation planned for this weekend.
that sounds amazing. how are you planning to relax?
i have some leftover roast in the fridge so i do not even have to leave the house. i am going to watch a lot of netflix and maybe do a little laundry.
label: content
response: that sounds very relaxing. do not forget the snacks for netflix!

situation: i keep having these dreams that i am out in public and somehow my clothes disappear. it is awful.
dialogue: i keep having these dreams that i am out in public and somehow my clothes disappear. it is awful.
that could possibly indicate that you are a free creature! and you do not like to be caged! do not worry about it the dream, as they are only metaphorical

i hate those dreams, i feel anything but free. they are really uncomfortable and make me nothing but a ball of negative emotions like anxiety as i spend the majority of the dream trying to find clothes and get away from people.
label: embarrassed
response: do not worry, you are wearing clothes now are not you?

situation: one of my friends recently bought a house. i really wish i could afford a house.
dialogue: one of my friends recently bought a house. i really wish i could afford a house.
wow that is great for your friend! and do not stress it, we are still young and have plenty of time to save up for a house!
i am starting to feel like i will never be able to afford a house. they are just so expensive. and the market has been going up here about 5% a year for the past 10 years.
label: jealous
response: wow that is crazy, i know how you feel, the best solution is to probably find a cheap place to rent out until it is possible to buy one.

situation: i ended up staying at home for the holidays, all my family lives in another state. i basically just sat at home in the dark watching lord of the rings.
dialogue: i ended up staying at home for the holidays
why is that? comfort ?
no all my family lives out of state. i did not feel like traveling, but i just ended up sitting at home and watching lord of the rings in the dark.
label: lonely
response: oh nice! that is sounds so amazing, i love watching lord of the rings every now and then, did you watch all the sequels all over again?

situation: one time i bumped into a friend from middle school. it really brought me back
dialogue: i bumped into a friend from middle school. we chatted for a while
wow, that must have been nice to catch up. when was the last time you saw your friend?
before 9th grade. i moved away that summer. seeing her brought back a lot of good memories
label: nostalgic
response: seeing old friends that you have not contacted in so long is a nice feeling.

situation: i had a doctors appointment at 9 am, i had to wait an hour and a half to even start my appointment.
dialogue: i had a doctors appointment at 9 am and they kept me waiting for almost 2 hours.
really!? that is very unprofessional of them to make you wait for so long.
it was terrible i ended being late for work because of their horrible service.
label: annoyed
response: that is frustrating. you should complain to them.

situation: moving forward from a dark situation
dialogue: the past few months have been terribly rough, but i think i can say that they have made me stronger.
oh no, i am sorry that you have been having a rough time, but i am glad to hear that you have grown from your experiances.
thank you. i hope that i can move forward and at least learn from these hardships.
label: hopeful
response: yeah i believe that you will be able to, but never forget you are not alone! i am always here if you need some moral support

situation: ex blames me for all things bad.
dialogue: i really hate when people cannot hold themselves accountable for their own actions and decisions.
i agree. so often does pride get in the way of personal growth and reflection.
absolutely. yet, these people have a horrible way of twisting things in order to guilt you, even if you would done nothing wrong! it is a very manipulating and confusing feeling.
label: guilty
response: you would hope folks would grow up, but sometimes people get set in their ways, and become impossible to change.

situation: received an off-putting email
dialogue: i received a very odd message today. it came from a person who i blocked online, but they managed to find a loophole and messaged me by way of an inactive group.
oh no, what did they say?
they were just trying to find ways to contact me. i have literally blocked them on all social media. it seems borderline stalkish, and it makes me very anxious.
label: anxious
response: that is really creepy, i would feel anxious too. i think you should report the to the police if you notice any strange or threatening messages,feel free to also call me if you need anything!

situation: i have to go rock climbing with some friends. i have practiced climbing indoors, but have never done a big climb outside so who knows how it will go.
dialogue: i am going rock climbing with some friends!
that sounds fun and scary! you must be pretty fit to take on that challenge.
i have done some climbing indoors for practice, but never done a big climb out doors, so who know how it will go.
label: afraid
response: i am sure that there will be some differences, but i am sure you will nail it! just remember to be safe!

situation: i had a bad nightmare last night.
dialogue: i keep having these really weird nightmares at night.
oh my, what are they about?
i am usually in a big city that i am familiar with, and roam around in the dream until i get stalked, jumped, and sometimes very hurt.
label: afraid
response: wow sounds like some inception plot line, you need to learn how to control the dream

situation: impressed at my endurance after working out.
dialogue: today i was quite impressed with my endurance during my work out. a few months ago, i could not even walk up a flight of stairs without losing my breath.
sound like you are making a lot of progress!
i sure have, but it is such hard work. i make sure to work out, even on the days that i do not want to. it is definitely taken a lot of will power.
label: impressed
response: that is great! all the hard work is paying off.

situation: healthy baby after a high risk pregnancy.
dialogue: i had a high risk pregnancy up until a few months ago. i felt the most grateful i would ever been when my baby turned out healthy.
congrats, that must have been a very stressful time leading up the the birth.
it was a really rough pregnancy that ended with a very painful surgery. it was not pretty, but definitely worth it. i would have taken any amount of pain as long as my son was born healthy and safe.
label: grateful
response: you sound like a great mother. i am sure your son is very lucky to have you.

situation: i just performed my first triple spin twirl in ice skating, i never though i would have the balance to perform such a feat!
dialogue: i just learned my first trick in ice skating, a triple spin twirl kick front flip.
wow that sounds challenging! you must have some serious strength to pull that off!
i never thought i would have the balance to perform such a feat. i think i can no qualify for the olympics.
label: proud
response: you should definitely try! it would be tough, but if you have the determination, it would be so worth it.

situation: school has lead me to a lack of social life.
dialogue: i just started college again, and while i am doing great in school, it has lead me to feel very lonely with a lack of social life.
oh no! you should try to make some more friends with your classmates.
that sound like a good idea if they were not online classes. next semester i have a few on campus courses, so i am hoping i will be able to make at least one new friend.
label: lonely
response: i hope you are able to find some friends in the next semester then!

situation: taking a large amount of classes this upcoming semester.
dialogue: this upcoming semester will be my first time taking 5 classes at once. i am pretty worried that i may have taken on too much.
yeah that sounds hectic. you think you can do it?
i am not sure. the more i think about it, the more i doubt myself. i also have a baby, so i am hoping i will be able to juggle everything at once.
label: terrified
response: yeah sounds like a handful! maybe you should weigh your options and do whats best for you adn your family.

situation: i am in love with my girlfriend. i would absolutely never leave her side.
dialogue: i adore my girlfriend. i am getting very serious about not leaving her side.
that is great to here!
thank you. do you have a romantic interest?
label: faithful
response: not at the moment. i am too focused on bettering myself.

situation: summer in the south calls for many unwanted visitors.
dialogue: summer in the south calls for many unwanted visitors of the insect type!
i am from the south too! are you talking about mosquitoes by any chance?
mosquitoes, and those dreadful flying ants. they are everywhere!
label: annoyed
response: one day we'll find a way to repay them all the misery they've caused us.

situation: being a successful single mothr.
dialogue: lately i have felt proud of my success as a newly single mother. it gets lonely sometimes, but i can honestly say i have been doing everything i can and more.
keep up the good work! you will do good in life and be a good role model for your kids.
thank you! i definitely have a drive to feel strong for them. i hope some day they can realize my efforts.
label: proud
response: they will notice how caring you are! do not ever cut yourself short!

situation: i have so many great friends. i let my friend drive me to south florida from georgia, safely.
dialogue: i have a plethora of amazing friends. one of mine recently drove me from georgia to south florida
that does sound like a good friend. how long of a drive is that?
it is an 8 hour drive! florida is a very long state
label: trusting
response: you are lucky to have such a good friend!

situation: i recently wrecked my car. there were no injuries, but i feel terrible.
dialogue: i recently totaled my car. there were no injuries but i feel absolutely terrible
oh no! i have been there. how did it happen?
it was very wet and i took a turn at too high of a speed.
label: ashamed
response: i am glad your safe! those roads can be dangerous.

situation: trying to make amends with my mother.
dialogue: my mom and i have not always had the best relationship. recently i have had to tell myself to let her in more. it is been challenging.
i hope that your relationship continues to strengthen.
thank you. i know that, even though it is challenging, i need to be patient in order to improve our relationship.
label: trusting
response: i agree. life is short and having these relationships is very important

situation: getting my aggressive rat to be friendly.
dialogue: i have had the toughest time getting my pet rat to get along with others. she is always been very aggressive!
oh no! i hope it do not bite anyone. that can be nervwrecking.
she is never bitten anyone, thankfully, but she gets crazy with other rats. to my surprise though, i have recently found her snuggling with the others she usually tries to fight!
label: surprised
response: i am glad it worked out well. i bet your finally content with her being around other rats.

situation: going to an amusement park.
dialogue: this past month, i was able to visit six flags!
that is neat and sounds like a lot of fun!
it was amazing. the last time i was at an amusement park had to have been over a decade ago!
label: excited
response: i have not been in years! was it as fun this time as it was years ago?

situation: my pet has a tumor.
dialogue: the other day i noticed my pet has a growth on her lower belly. i fear it may be a tumor.
what kind of pet is it? hope your animal is okay!
she is a rat, so her body is very frail. i am sad that she likely will not make it. she is been with me through thick and thin.
label: sad
response: i heard rats make awesome pets, i am so sorry! is your rat in pain?

situation: i have been recently thinking about how i let the girl of my dreams slip from me. she is great.
dialogue: i let the girl of my dreams slip away. now i am alone.
i am sure with the help and support he will be alright.
i hope so. i think that time heals all wounds.
label: sentimental
response: definitely, i think so too, time and right care.

situation: i recently went to the pool. i lost my swim trunks and felt awkward!
dialogue: i recently went to the pool and lost my suit. my trunks were in the water without me!
oh my! i hope you were the only one there! otherwise that would have been scary!
i was not, unfortunately. people saw everything!
label: embarrassed
response: oh my god! how embarrassing! looksl like you will stay inside for awhile.

situation: i recently let a girl slip through my fingers. she is now with somebody that i do not like.
dialogue: i let a romantic interest slip through my fingers. she is now with somebody that i despise
wow, that is so sad. hopefully a new love will come to you!
i think so. i have plenty of time and life goes
label: jealous
response: sure, it is never too late. and you never know what is gonna happen soon.

situation: i feel great these days. with my new album coming out, i feel as powerful as ever.
dialogue: i feel great right now. i have a new album coming out and it feels liberating to be done!
very nice! i bet your very proud of it and are excited for what may come from it.
i am very excited. it is almost an hour and a half long
label: confident
response: i bet you worked very hard on it! it will be great!

situation: i cannot wait to go travel! i have an upcoming trip to madagascar
dialogue: i cannot wait to travel. i am going to madagascar soon!
wow! that sounds exciting! have you traveled around the world a lot?
i have! i actually grew up in saudi arabia
label: anticipating
response: traveling is the best way to learn about other cultures. you are very fortunate to get the opportunity.

situation: the world is a crazy place. there are a handful of special people trying to lead us into the next decade
dialogue: the world is savage. i believe that the right individuals can take us to a better place in the future
i agree, we need more moral people to guide us.
i think so too. there are some kind and great people in the world
label: hopeful
response: let's hope they find their way to the top soon for our sake.

situation: i once walked alone in the woods at night. i was so scared.
dialogue: i went walking in the woods one night. it was pretty scary out there
did anything happen?
no, everything was fine, but it was a chilling experience
label: terrified
response: oh, i am sure. at least everything ended up alright though.

situation: one time my brother left my nephew's dirty diaper on the couch and i caught the dog trying to eat it. it was so gross.
dialogue: i caught my dog trying to eat my nephew's dirty diaper that my brother left on the couch
oh man, that is funny and terrible at the same time.
it was really gross. i had to keep my dog from licking my face for a long time after that.
label: disgusted
response: yeah, i would keep away from him for another 2 months or so.

situation: i recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away. she would give hundreds of dollars of school supplies to kids in need each year.
dialogue: i recently remembered a sweet memory of my aunt who recently passed away.
what was it?
she would give hundreds of dollars of school supplies to kids in need each year.
label: sentimental
response: wow, that is an amazing woman. did she rub off on you any?

situation: my daughter and her family are coming this thanksgiving to visit. i just cannot wait and am already planning everything for when they get here even though it is months away
dialogue: my daughter and her family are coming this thanksgiving. i am already preparing for their visit.
oh that is exciting! are you nervous at all?
not too much, just really exciting. i am planning everything even though it is months away, even the menu.
label: anticipating
response: oh wow, it sounds like you really love them. i am super happy for you! i hope it goes exactly how you planned. you sound like a good father.

situation: my mother in law was recently placed in hospice and is not expected to live much longer.
dialogue: my mother in law was recently placed in hospice and is not expected to live much longer.
oh man. it is always tough to lose a parent. how old is she?
she is 87, so she has lived a long life, but she has alzheimers, and it is really sad to watch her lose her mind.
label: devastated
response: yeah i bet. at least you got to know her for as long as you did

situation: one time i was driving home late at night in the middle of nowhere and i was sleepy. the roads were narrow and a lot of the time an 18-wheeler would pass by me and i was fearful that i would collide with them
dialogue: i was driving home from out of town really late one night and was exhausted
that is very dangerous , driving and being exhausted did you manage to get home safe?

i did get home safe but it was scary because the roads were two lane and lots of 18-wheelers were heading in the opposite direction. i kept thinking i would swerve into their lane and collide into them
label: anxious
response: i am glad you did not

situation: i have been trying to be extra supportive towards my husband. his mom is dying, and he is working long hours on top of it.
dialogue: i have been trying to be extra supportive towards my husband.
that is nice to hear.  it is always a good thing in a marriage to show each other support through thick and thin.
yes so true. his mom is dying, and he is working long hours on top of it. i feel really bad for him.
label: caring
response: i am sorry to hear that.  just knowing that he has you to lean on probably goes a very long way in helping him get through that.
