situation: my friend whom i have not seen in a long time came to visit. she drove up in a really nice car and was dressed really well. she married a very wealthy man and i just a bit envious
dialogue: my friend who i have not seen in a long time came to visit. she married a very wealthy man and i was a bit envious
oh no! were you envious because you liked her yourself, or because you do not have a wealthy husband?
she drove up in a fancy car and seems like she does not have a care in the world. i wish that were me some days.
label: jealous
response: it can be you, you just have to work hard for it.

situation: i was at a get together recently and a friend's husband was flirting with me. i made it very clear to him that i am happy in my marriage and not interested.
dialogue: i was at a get together recently and a friend's husband was flirting with me.
i feel bad for your friend. did you tell her?
i did not know what to say to her, and was afraid she would not believe me and it would cause her to be angry at me. it is a bad situation.
label: faithful
response: oh god, that sounds terrible

situation: when i was in second grade, i wet my pants in the middle of class.
dialogue: when i was in second grade, i wet my pants in the middle of class.
oh that is so embaressing
i know! i was super afraid of my teacher, and was scared to ask her to go to the bathroom.
label: embarrassed
response: why are were you scared? do not be next time stand up and ask your teacher you want to go to the toilet otherwise you will wet your pants

situation: one time i wanted to trick my butler into thinking he had won the lottery. so i taped the previous day's newscast about the winning lottery numbers and bought a ticket with those numbers, gave it to my butler, and watched the previous day's announcement with him
dialogue: i want to trick my butler into thinking he won the lottery. i have taped the local new's winning lottery numbers and i am going to buy a ticket with the same numbers and give it to my butler
that is hilarious! is he usually down for a good prank?
i am not sure he likes being the target of pranks, but he likes to prank me and this prank is to get back at him for a prank he pulled on me and my cousin
label: prepared
response: well, that is fair. if he pulls them, he has to be willing to have them pulled on him, too.

situation: my friend just took her kids to disneyland. i feel bad- i would been wanting to do that trip with my kids for years.
dialogue: my friend just took her kids to disneyland and i feel a little bad about it.
why is that?
i would been wanting to do that trip with my kids for years. i am happy for her- just wish it could have been me.
label: jealous
response: i can understand that. it is a tough trip to make, but hopefully you will be able to soon.

situation: one time i took part in an essay contest. a few months later i found out that my essay was chosen and that i won a trip to washington, d.c.
dialogue: i won a trip to washington d.c. a few years ago
and how was it? did you enjoy it?
i had a blast. i met people from all over the country, visited many historical sites, and learned a lot about how government works
label: joyful
response: and how was it? did you enjoy it?

situation: i am looking forward to my best friend's surprise birthday party next week!
dialogue: i am looking forward to my best friend's surprise birthday party next week!
that sounds like so much fun! i love parties!
i am really happy about it- she is a great friend and she is turning 40, so it is a big one!
label: anticipating
response: hey, i just had that one! what do you have planned?

situation: my 25th high school reunion is coming up and i am excited.
dialogue: my 25th high school reunion is coming up and i am excited.
that sounds like fun! are you looking forward to seeing anyone in particular?
honestly? there was this girl who really treated me poorly i cannot wait for her to see how successful i have been!
label: confident
response: well i hope she is there. maybe she will regret how she treated you.

situation: one time a hurricane hit my city and it was so windy i could not sleep that night. i thought the wind would tear the roof off of the house
dialogue: a hurricane hit my city. the first night i thought the wind was going to tear the roof off the house
oh no! hurricanes are scary.  i have been through a few myself.  was it your first one?
it was my third. luckily we did not lose power for more than a few hours
label: afraid
response: i lost power in our last hurricane for 3 days.  did the wind do any damage to your home?

situation: i am loyal to my principles, that is why i do not eat meat
dialogue: i am loyal to my principles, that is why i do not eat meat, because i love life
wow,  you are a vegetarian?
if i already have 10 years of vegetarian
label: faithful
response: this is serious.  for me,  i do not joke with meat

situation: my daughter recently broke curfew by three hours!
dialogue: my daughter recently broke curfew by three hours!
that must've made you so furious
i was super angry, yes! i ended up grounding her for three weeks- one week for each hour she was late.
label: furious
response: you sure are a very strict parent.

situation: i have a certification exam coming up and i think i will do well!
dialogue: i have a certification exam coming up and i think i will do well.
that is great! i am sure you will be well prepared.
i think so- i have studied quite a bit with my husband and others.
label: prepared
response: then i am sure it will go well for you. what is it in?

situation: seeing his sad eyes my heart suffers, my daughter is my weakness
dialogue: hello . i confess that when i see my daughter's eyes, my heart suffers.
wow,  what happened to her eyes?
they are sick
label: sentimental
response: ohhh sorry about that. it is well.

situation: i was grateful for my pay-rise thanks to my new manager. nice guy.
dialogue: my new manager gave me a pay-rise!
that is got to be an amazing feeling to have going for you. how do you feel?
i feel very grateful that he has been so generous.
label: grateful
response: it is going to help your family out so much i bet everyone is so proud of you, congrats you deserve it.

situation: i felt very lonely when my partner decided to leave me for someone else.
dialogue: my partner left me the other day.
that is rough, i am sorry to hear that
that is fine, its not your problem. i just feel very lonely right now.
label: lonely
response: i am sure you will find someone who will love you even more than your ex did soon.

situation: one time i moved to a new city and did not know anyone. i had to go out alone to do things
dialogue: i just moved to a new city and i do not know anyone
that is too bad, you have to go out and make new friends.
yeah, it is hard though. i hate to go out by myself. it is hard for me to meet new people
label: lonely
response: suck it up and get out there, it is the only way or you will end up very lonely.

situation: i took my final exams two weeks ago and i was sure that i had done well. i studied and got good grades on all of my quizes but when i got my results back i had failed the test and have to retake the class.
dialogue: i took my final exams a few weeks ago and i was sure i had done well, but i failed.
oh i am so sorry to hear that!
i do not know what happened. i studied and passed everything else. now i have to retake the class and i am upset
label: confident
response: is there somewhere you can go for extra help with that course? a tutor or something?

situation: my sister kept repeating a few seconds of a song on her laptop and i could hear it from my room. it drove me bonkders
dialogue: my sister kept playing a few seconds of a song over and over again on her laptop last night. now it is stuck in my head.
that is so annoying.  i hate it when that happens.
it drives me bonkers when she does that
label: annoyed
response: can you block her out, maybe?  get some noise blocking headphones?

situation: i saw these 4-color bic pens in the store the other day. i remember when i was young and getting one was like christmas morning!
dialogue: i saw these 4-color bic pens in the store the other day. i remember when i was young and getting one was like christmas morning!
the ones with the little colored sliders on the end? those were cool!
yes! my mom used to always get me one each year before school started. those were the coolest pens in the world!
label: nostalgic
response: i liked them too.

situation: i am optimistic that my house is going to sell soon.
dialogue: i am optimistic that my house is going to sell soon.
has it been on the market for long?
only a week- and 17 people have seen it already, so i am feeling good about it selling quickly!
label: hopeful
response: wow! that is awesome. i am sure you will sell soon.

situation: my best friend was going to travel from wisconsin to see my this summer, but she ended up not being able to come.
dialogue: my best friend was going to travel from wisconsin to see my this summer, but she ended up not being able to come.
oh that is too bad, what did you end up doing
nothing- i still have not seen her. i felt pretty let down but hopefully i can make the trip to see her soon.
label: disappointed
response: you should defently and do not let this affect you too much, maybe she has a good reason

situation: my sister threw up the other day and made a huge mess.
dialogue: my sister threw up the other day and made a huge mess.
that must have been an explosion and a half, did  you clean it up?
fortunately no- she cleaned it up. but she had just had spaghetti and it was floating in it. it was so gross!
label: disgusted
response: i can imagine, that is gross as hell

situation: i could not believe when i woke up the other day and was about to go to work, i saw that someone had broken in to my car. i was so mad. i had heard there had been some problems with car break-ins but i did not think it would happen to me because we live in a nice neighborhood.
dialogue: i was livid when i went to work the other day and saw my car was broken in to
oh no! that is terrible! i have had that happen before and it sucks
i heard it was happening in other areas but did not expect it here because we live in a nice neighborhood. so frustrating
label: furious
response: i can imagine. did they steal anything?

situation: back to school time always brings back so many memories of when my kids were going to school. i would cry every year on the first day of school, especially if it was a milestone year.
dialogue: every year when the kids go back to school, it brings back so many memories of when my kids were going to school.
i know what you mean.  i love to see all the pictures, and think back to how little mine used to be.
i would cry the first day of school every year, especially the milestone years. now my grandchildren are starting school. time flies by too quickly
label: nostalgic
response: they do seem to be grown before you know it.  make you wonder how if goes so fast!

situation: i just ate a whole box of cookies.
dialogue: so everyone is gone form the house and i found a thing of thin mints, and i ate the whole thing for breakfast.
sometimes it is ok to indulge. did it give you a stomachache though?
lol, i swear it was like i sat down and they were gone!  probably gave myself diabetes. so not going to be able to eat the rest of the day!
label: ashamed
response: you should follow up with a few veggies later on maybe to balance it out. i know that feeling though. its just so good you cannot eat just one

situation: my father passed away in november, it is made me feel empty ever since.
dialogue: my father passed away in november, it is made me feel empty ever since.
i am so sorry for your loss! it is so hard to lose a parent.
i did not think it would hit me hard. i felt like i was prepared.
label: devastated
response: sadly, i do not think we can ever be prepared for that kind of loss.

situation: i surprised my girlfriend with chik-fil-a breakfast this morning when she got off work.
dialogue: i surprised my girlfriend with chik-fil-a breakfast this morning when she got off work.
wow,  that is so nice of you
she works nights, and had no idea i was coming. i knew she had a bad night so i wanted to do something nice for her.
label: caring
response: that is cool.  you are really so caring

situation: i got laid off from my job a couple of months ago. every week starts off the same. i look for jobs, apply for jobs and yet i am still unemployed. i try to stay optimistic though that something will come along soon.
dialogue: i recently was laid off from my job. i have not found anything yet, but i am trying to stay positive that i will soon.
oh darn, that sucks.  keeping a positive attitude is the way to go! i am sure something is out there for you.
i keep looking and applying, but still here i sit. i know it will happen when the right one comes along though
label: hopeful
response: and here the job market was supposed to get great again.

situation: i lost the book that my friend let me borrow. i feel so embarrassed.
dialogue: i lost the book that my friend let me borrow. i feel so embarrassed.
oh no! can you replace it?
i am trying to find a new one, but this one was rare and hard to find.
label: ashamed
response: i am sure your friend will be understanding that it was a mistake.

situation: my birthday was last week. i never heard from my brother or sister to wish me happy birthday. i guess i expected to much and they let me down
dialogue: my birthday was last week and i never heard from my brother or my sister to wish me a happy birthday.
oh no i am sorry to hear that! they must have been really busy and it must have slipped their mind
i guess i should not expect so much from them and let myself get let down like i have.
label: disappointed
response: i am sure they had their reasons, maybe you should give them a call and see if everything is alright. they may be going through their own problems right now.

situation: the older i get, the more relaxed and just a simple happy and calm feeling i have. it is nice to just enjoy being alive.
dialogue: the older i get, the more relaxed and just a simple happy and calm feeling i have. it is nice to just enjoy being alive.
i agree. the sound of birdsong, a gentle breeze on a summer's day, the purring of your tabby-cat. you cannot beat that, can you?
those examples are definitely the simple pleasures of life. it makes me want to go outside and listen to the birds and smell the flowers.
label: content
response: you should! forget about your worries, if only for a moment. you will return feeling refreshed.

situation: i went swimming the other day and when i jump into the water and came back up, my bathing suit top was pulled over my breast and i was wandering why everyone was staring at me.
dialogue: i went swimming the other day and when i jump into the water and came back up, my bathing suit top was pulled over my breast and i was wandering why everyone was staring at me.
yikes, that is not a fun situation. did you figure it out pretty quickly?
yes i did realize fairly fast why everyone was staring. i looked down and seen my breast exposed.
label: embarrassed
response: that is good, i would be mortified if that happened to me.

situation: my cat seems to like my new girlfriend more than me, he sleeps with her on her side of the bed now.
dialogue: i think my cat likes my new girlfriend more than he likes me now.
i have had that happen before. my cat is definitely more my wife's cat now. does he still cuddle up with you?
yea he loves to sit on my lap while i work, but prefers her side of the bed now when he sleeps.
label: jealous
response: haha, same for me. it is like as soon as my wife is available to sit or lay with, i am chopped liver.

situation: my grandfather left a lot of his possessions to me, i recently received the stuff. was emotional to go through.
dialogue: my grandfather passed away not too long ago, i received a bunch of items he left for me.
i am sorry for your loss, i bet you two were close. what did he leave you?
some interesting antiques, grandfather clocks, and a lot of items related to his work for the house of representatives. interesting stuff
label: sentimental
response: oh he worked for congress? that is very interesting. that sounds like an awesome haul of vintage stuff.

situation: the other day i had to let my dad drive my car. it was no big deal to me though, he is a very good driver, and i know he would take good care of my car.
dialogue: i had to let my dad borrow my car the other day. his truck is in the shop.
that was kind of you! has his truck been repaired?
yeah it has. and, he took good care of my car, as always.
label: trusting
response: of course! your dad is very trustworthy.

situation: i wet my pants because i had a dream that i was going to the restroom.
dialogue: i ca not believe what happened the other night at my friends house, i will never show my face again.
can you please give a little more detail about what happened at your friends house that made you not want to show your face??
sure, i fell asleep on the chair and had a dream, in my dream i went to the restroom, so yeah, i peed right there in their chair.
label: ashamed
response: how embarrassing! i did that one time when i was sleeping in my bed and i thought i got up and went to the bathroom to pee, but i did not go to the bathroom, i peed my pants in the bed.

situation: i enjoy helping the wildlife in my area where i live. i give them a helping hand. i give them water, birdseed, my left over food. the animals love watermelon and cantaloupe.
dialogue: i enjoy helping the wildlife in my area where i live. i give them a helping hand. i give them water, birdseed, my left over food. the animals love watermelon and cantaloupe.
that is so cool, my mother in law has bears come into her yard! i would be happy with the hummingbirds, so pretty.
i just have the small non dangerous type of wildlife that i like to help birds, rabbits, squirrels and such. no big bad bears!
label: caring
response: the squirrels keep stealing the feed in my birdfeeder, they do trapeze to get to it.

situation: my father in law's dog had a puppy. we took it in and are giving him a forever home.
dialogue: we got a new puppy! we took him in from our father in law.
that is amazing! we just got a new puppy this last weekend also! what kind is yours?
its a long hair chihuahua and a short hair chihuahua. he has the most adorable under bite!
label: caring
response: aw that is super cute! dogs bring such happiness to a home.

situation: i found out my wife was having an affair with one of her co-workers, i had him over at our house and was kind to him.
dialogue: i found out my wife was having an affair, the worst part is i knew the guy and welcomed him in my home and was kind to him.
oh man, i am really sorry you have to go through that. betrayal like that is so painful. how are you doing?
i am learning to live my live without her, it is tough. some honesty would have made the way it ended much better. thanks for the kind words.
label: furious
response: of course, no one deserves to have their heartbroken like that. i hope you find someone who treats you with the respect and kindness you deserve.

situation: i decided to go on a soda fast for two days so that i could spend some time praying for my husband as he tried to quit smoking. i am addicted to soda so it was very hard. i did manage to make it without drinking soda for those two days but it was hard.
dialogue: i went on a soda fast for two days so that i could pray for strength for my husband while he tried to quit smoking. i am addicted to soda so it was hard. i made it though and i was able to pray for him multiple times during the two days.
sugar is very addicting! i am glad you could make it
yeah me too. the lack of caffeine made me get a bad headache that took three days to get rid of.
label: faithful
response: caffeine headaches are no joke.

situation: recently, i had an argument with a friend. i caleld her out on her behavior to her face, but my daughter overheard me discussing it with my husband and thought that i had talked behind my friend's back, so she thought that i was being two-faced and we had to have a whole conversation about it. i felt guilty even though i did not do anything wrong.
dialogue: i recently had an argument with a friend. even though i talked ot her about it and let her know how i felt, my daughter overheard me discussing it with my husband. she thought i was being two faced, which lead to a long discussion. i felt guilty even though i did not do anything wrong.
sounds like you were just misunderstood. i discuss things with my husband, too, and it is not like talking behind someone's back. that is what married couples do. do not feel bad.
yeah, i just felt like i set a bad example for my daughter, even thought she misunderstood. i guess it was a teachable moment though.
label: ashamed
response: yes, just tell her your home is a safe place to talk. it is okay to open up in the family.

situation: i was browsing through my old cd collection and found a bunch of old pc games i used to play. some of the classics like command and conquer, age of empires, warcraft.
dialogue: i found huge box full of my old cd's recently, found a ton of old pc games i used to play, reminded me of a simpler time!
awesome! did you play any of them after you found the box?
i did, i played a few sessions of age of empires and i plan to play some command and conquer red alert tonight before bed, still great games.
label: nostalgic
response: neat! i have not played them. even though everything is becoming digital, i find there is something special about the physical copies!

situation: i got turned down for a job i really wanted.  i would worked extremely hard to put myself in a position to have a decent chance of getting it, and i thought i interviewed really well.  but when i found out someone else got the job i was extremely disappointed and demoralized.
dialogue: i got turned down for a job i really wanted.
ugh, sorry! you must be disappointed. but remember if the door does not open, it probably was not yours. there is something else in store for you!
thanks.  but yes, i was really dejected.  i thought i would interviewed well and had a good enough resume.
label: devastated
response: sometimes they already have a candidate in mind but have to go through the motion..the same thing happened to my husband. your time will come.

situation: after my wife left me, i have been trying to better myself and have a prosperous future. i am looking to make positive changes and am optimistic about the future.
dialogue: when my wife left me, i felt worthless and like giving up on life to be honest, i have since started making some positive changes and and more optimistic
i cannot even imagine how devastating that would be. i think you must be really strong to be able to move forward.
well, like the saying goes, get busy living or get busy dying. i am not sure if i will ever find someone i truly love but life goes on!
label: hopeful
response: you might, but i believe you can have a full life as a single person, too.

situation: i bought a 20 foot boat. i believe it will be able to handle the large lake that i will be taking it on.
dialogue: i bought a 20 foot boat. i believe it will be able to handle the large lake that i will be taking it on.
wow! a 20 foot boat, that must be amazing to take out on the lake! how much did it cost you?
it cost me around $30,000. it has all the latest features, that should keep me safe in all but the most extreme conditions.
label: trusting
response: id love to own a boat, are you using it for leisure or fishing etc?

situation: i do not like loaning money to friends because a lot of the time it does not get paid back or ruins the friendship. i recently loaned my friend some money because of her situation not counting on getting it back but i did.
dialogue: i like like loaning money to friends. it can ruin friendships and sometimes does not get paid back.
i am always leery of loaning money to friends
yeah, i meant do not like, sorry. i recently lent some to my friend with no expectation of getting it back because of her hard situation. i actually got it back.
label: trusting
response: that was a nice surprise!  i have tried lending money to friends but finally had to stop after never getting it back

situation: late last summer, my dog went missing. i caleld everyone in the neighborhood to see if they had seen him. i spent hours looking for him and i checked all of the shelters for about a week. we eventually found his body. he had gotten trapped under a neighbor's house and could not get out.
dialogue: last summer, my dog went missing. we looked for him everywhere and called all of our neighbors. no one had seen him.
oh no! how sad! did you ever find him?

after a week of looking for him and checking the shelters, a neighbor found his body under her house. he had gotten under there and could not find a way out. i was so heart broken and so were my daughters.
label: devastated
response: oh, how awful! i am so sorry!

situation: i really enjoy going out and skating with my kids in the evening. its the most fun part of my day.
dialogue: i try to skateboard with my kids everyday. they love it, and it makes me feel young again.
wow, very cool. the last time i tried to skateboard i almost broke my tailbone. props to you though!
it can be scary some times, but its worth it.
label: content
response: is it though? haha. if you can do it without falling down then you are doing better than me. probably a good bonding experience i would imagine.

situation: half of my family did not show up for my kids 6th birthday, it was upsetting to say the least. she was looking forward to seeing them.
dialogue: my daughters 6th birthday was recently, unfortunately her mothers side of the family did not show up, even though they all rsvp'd
too bad for them! my sons 6th birthday was just last week, and we had a fun party. there so much easier to please when their little.
hah yea, she was sad at first but there was plenty of presents and people who love her around to distract her. they grow up fast.
label: disappointed
response: they do. i cannot believe how fast the time goes.

situation: i missed a chance to get a new job the other week. i really wish i had put my resume in sooner.
dialogue: the other week, a friend of mine told me there was an opening where he worked and to get him a resume. i took to long to get my resume together and they gave the job to someone else.
that must have been aggravating! job hunting is so hard.
it would have been nice. less pay, but i would have had to work less. oh well, guess i will try harder next time.
label: ashamed
response: maybe something better will come along!

situation: the other day i was running late. so, i jumped up and threw on some clean clothes. after i did half of my errands i noticed the shirt i was wearing was stained all over with grease.
dialogue: the other day i was running late. so, i jumped up and threw on some clothes then ran out of the house.
well i hope you got there in time and nothing bad happened.
i did but when after i was out for a while i noticed the shirt i was wearing was covered in grease stains. i apparently washed it with my husbands work clothes.
label: ashamed
response: oh know! i hope you were not heading to a job interview, haha.

situation: i pooed my pants one day at work. i have ms and sometimes during flare ups i have bowel control problems.
dialogue: i have ms, and sometimes i have bowl problems.
i am so sorry. have you tried any natural remedies?
no, i have tried science remedies. i like those kinds better.
label: embarrassed
response: i hope you find something that gives you some relief!

situation: my son got a cool remote control car for his birthday. it was really cool. after he went to bed i took it outside and played with it for a while.
dialogue: my son got a remote control car for his birthday. its really cool.
that is awesome. did you get him it? i bet he loves it.
no, his grandpa did. but, after he went to bed, i went outside and played with it for a while.
label: jealous
response: haha i would've done the same. those toys always make me lose myself. they are so much fun!

situation: the other day i seen someone had broken into my car. they did not take anything. i am not sure if i should feel violated, or bad because i had nothing worth stealing.
dialogue: someone broke into my car the other day, but they did not steal anything.
wow you were lucky! it has happened to me before too. it feels so violating.
i know! i feel both violated and kind of sad because i have nothing in my car worth stealing.
label: furious
response: because you were not in it.

situation: there was an elderly lady at my church who was blind, but she was faithful about coming to church. different church members helped her to and from her seat and to and from the preacher's car since he was the one who picked her up. every time i saw that she needed help, i tried to direct her using words like " go a little to your left or right". she recently passed away. i miss her.
dialogue: there was an elderly lady at my church who was blind and could not hear well so you had to talk really loud for her to hear you. she was very faithful about coming to church so our preacher picked her up and took her home for every service. when she needed help, we took turns helping her.
that is so nice of you all! i know she appreciates it.
when i saw that she needed help, i always tried to give her directions based on where she was with her walker. i liked helping her. she recently passed away and i miss her.
label: caring
response: aww, i am so sorry but know you made a difference in her life.

situation: my son went for his first day of kindergarten. he likes it so far so that is good.
dialogue: i took my son to kindergarten the other day. he loves it so far!
that is good! did he make any friends?
you bet! he made a girlfriend on the bus by talking about zelda.
label: hopeful
response: that is really cute!

situation: lately, my family and i have been very blessed. we have been going to a three week long revival, our major bills for the month are already paid, and we have all been healthy and happy. life is pretty good right now.
dialogue: lately, my family and i have been very blessed. we are all happy and healthy. all of our major bills have already been paid for the month, and we have been going to a three week long revival at a local church.
that is awesome! whats your secret to success?
we have just been trusting in the lord.
label: content
response: well he seems to be guiding you in the right direction. i hope your blessings continue!

situation: i was looking at some old pictures of my kids' first day of school from 4 years ago.
dialogue: i was looking at some old pictures of my kids' first day of school from 4 years ago.
first day of school i remember ,my kids first day of school, how did it make you feel?
it just gave me the feeling that time flies by too quickly sometimes.  my youngest in the pic was in first grade and his older sister was in 7th grade.
label: sentimental
response: yes it does but we always got or memories.

situation: i could not believe aretha franklin passed away last week.
dialogue: i could not believe aretha franklin passed away last week.
neither could i.  it was the first thing that was on the news right after i woke up.
sometimes you think people will be around forever, their aura is just so.legendary.
label: devastated
response: yea, i try not to think about that though because then it makes me sad.

situation: just finished eating dinner.  we had red beans and rice with sausage.  i am as full as a tick!
dialogue: i just finished eating dinner.  we had red beans and rice and with sausage.  i am as full as a tick!
that sounds amazing! how long does it take to make the beans? do you have to soak them?
i had to soak them for 3 hours.  i think that is what makes that meal so satisfying the wait!
label: content
response: i can smell the beans and sausage as we speak. i always find after cooking i am never hungry. maybe that is because i snacked the entire time i was cooking.

situation: found out some bad news today. due to a technicality, custody reverts back to my kids dad.
dialogue: found out some bad news today about my kids custody case.
oh no.  in those cases, it is either the best news or the worst news.
yeah, it really is. due to a technicality custody is reverting to their father.
label: devastated
response: i am sorry to hear that.  unfortunately, i know that same feeling all too well.

situation: i think i aced my supervisor exam!
dialogue: i think i aced my supervisor exam!
woo hoo! that is awesome! congrats! when will you find out/
i should know something by tomorrow morning.  hopefully they tell me right away.
label: confident
response: i hope so too! i will be sure to keep my fingers crossed for you! good luck!

situation: i have all my kids' things ready for the first day of school tomorrow!
dialogue: i have all my kids' things ready for the first day of school tomorrow!
good think you are prepared 👍
i think i am.  i tried to do as much in advance as i could.
label: prepared
response: hopefullybeveryday goes well.

situation: my daughter is in 8th grade and just started school for this year. she is already being bullied. i try to do what i can to make her feel better like hugs and goofy moments.
dialogue: my daughter is in 8th grade and just started school a little over a week ago. she is already being bullied.
oh no!  that is such a shame.  did you go to the principal?
yes, and will again because it did not help. i try to cheer her up with hugs, goofy moments, and whatever else i can think of.
label: caring
response: i am so sorry!  i hope it gets better for her.  middle school is no picnic, that is for sure.

situation: i almost had an affair once. a friend of mines girl friend came on to me when we were alone. i politely declined.
dialogue: i had a chance to cheat on my wife once,
oh no! that is horrible. please tell me you did not.
i did not. i left there quickly. it was not something i would ever want to do.
label: faithful
response: awww, that is awesome! i am so proud of you!

situation: my dog got very sick and did not leave her bed for weeks.  i was so concerned that i stayed with her most of that time.  i would lay beside her bed with her, trying to comfort her and make sure she had everything she needed.
dialogue: my dog got very sick and lay in bed for a couple weeks.  i was so concerned.
that is so sad i hope your pet gets better
she did get better eventually.  during that time i tried to tend to her as much as i could.
label: caring
response: that is so sweet, i think that is why she got better, your caring ways

situation: my roommate recently got a kitten, and he went out of town so i am watching over the little bugger.
dialogue: my roommate recently got a kitten, and he went out of town so i am watching over the little bugger.
do you like cats? kittens are the best!
i love cats, i have one of my own. i have not been around a kitten in forever so it is a real treat. i also do not have to sleep with the little brat at night either so it is especially great.
label: caring
response: yes i love cats as well i have one orange one and 4 dogs that get along pretty well all together

situation: i had a solo competition last week for cello. i was well prepared and knew my music well. i felt great walking into that room.
dialogue: i had a solo competition last week for cello. i was well prepared and knew my music well. i felt great walking into that room.
congrats!  how long have you been playing the cello?
i have been playing the cello for 5 years.
label: confident
response: how did you place in the competition?

situation: i slipped and feel at work the other day. several people saw it. i wanted to just crawl in a hole and hide afterwards.
dialogue: i slipped and feel at work the other day. several people saw it. i wanted to just crawl in a hole and hide afterwards.
oh dear that is embarrassing! i hope you did not hurt yourself.
just my pride
label: embarrassed
response: oh ha! i guess that is painful!

situation: my ex and i broke up because he decided that he would no longer be willing to leave his job from overwork, like 70 plus hours a week.
dialogue: my ex and i broke up because he decided that he would no longer be willing to leave his job from overwork, like 70 plus hours a week.
i am sorry. breakups are the worst. did he just not want to give up overtime or he worked 70hours always?
he claims that he kept getting raises and felt obligated to work even harder. so he just kept working more and more and i rarely got to spend time with him and he was always tired.
label: furious
response: that is rough but you deserve someone who is willing or wants to make the time for you. never settle for less than what you are willing to settle for.

situation: my ex recently said that he was wanting to get back together. i am not sure how to feel about it, we have been getting along great since we broke up.
dialogue: my ex recently said that he was wanting to get back together. i am not sure how to feel about it, we have been getting along great since we broke up.
why did yall break up?

the straw that broke the camels back is that he broke a promise that he would leave his job if they were over working him too much. he decided he did not want to leave after all and wants to keep working 70+ hour weeks every week.
label: hopeful
response: that does not leave much time for yalls relationship

situation: i came home today and the food i had put in the crock pot was ruined. the outlet must have died and the food sat in there all day not cooking.
dialogue: i came home today and the food i had put in the crock pot was ruined. the outlet must have died and the food sat in there all day not cooking.
oh darn i hate when that happens! i have experienced the same thing in the past once.
yeah it was pretty terrible. i had to throw out a ton of food, and to add insult to injure i had to go eat out tonight.
label: disappointed
response: yep not always a terrible time to eat out at least.

situation: i let a friend watch my child for the day while i ran some errands. usually i am very skeptical about letting people watch either of my kids but i knew i could count on her.
dialogue: i let my friend babysit my kid last week.
how did they do?
awesome. i usually have a hard time letting anyone watch my child but he had a great time with her.
label: trusting
response: how old's your child?

situation: i was out walking by the lake over the weekend and there shore was just covered in dead rotting fish.
dialogue: i was out walking by the lake over the weekend and there shore was just covered in dead rotting fish.
what happened why were their so many dead fish?
i do not know, that is what i would like to know! the best i can imagine is that the water quality dropped, and they died. i imagine it was pollution.
label: disgusted
response: i hope they are not using the lake for drinking water .

situation: i have a really big game coming up this weekend. i have not played soccer since i was a kid and have been really nervous about joining an adult league.
dialogue: i have a really big game coming up this weekend. i have not played soccer since i was a kid and have been really nervous about joining an adult league.
good luck! i am sure it will be fine.
i just do not want to embarrass myself or my team. i am so scared i am going to make a fool of myself.
label: anxious
response: you are too hard on yourself. everyone messes up sometimes, even the greats.

situation: several years ago one of my neighbors dogs attacked me and i had to go to the hospital to get stitches.
dialogue: several years ago one of my neighbors dogs attacked me and i had to go to the hospital to get stitches.
yikes that is no good. how many stitches did you have to get?
i had to get 2 stitches in one of the holes and 1 stitch and all the other holes. he was a big dog, a little over 50 pounds.
label: terrified
response: what happened to the dog afterwards?

situation: last year i made a bet with my friend and he lost, so he had to buy me a nintendo switch. i was so great.
dialogue: last year i made a bet with my friend and he lost, so he had to buy me a nintendo switch. i was so great.
that is quite the win! what was the bet?
i made a bet that he would not lose 20 pounds in 3.5 months. i was hoping that he would win the bet, but on the bright side i got a switch win-win for me.
label: joyful
response: oh! gotcha! i have never played the switch but i heard it is an exciting console!

situation: i value my friendships. i told a friend i would visit her this week and even though some things came up and i do not have the time i am going to make the time.
dialogue: i am visiting my friend this week.
oh cool, where does your friend live? is it an exciting location?
yes, i mean i promised her i would  and some things came up but i know i gotta stick to my word and make this happen.
label: faithful
response: oh man, do not bail on your trip. try and get those thing that came taken care of this week. you do not want to disappoint her.

situation: one time when i was little and playing hide and go seek, my cousin talked me into remaining hidden even when our parents came looking for us. after a while i realized that we were going to be in trouble, and then we saw a police car pull into the drive way.
dialogue: one time when i was little and playing hide and go seek, my cousin talked me into remaining hidden even when our parents came looking for us. after a while i realized that we were going to be in trouble, and then we saw a police car pull into the drive way.
oh no, i bet your parents were freaking out.
yeah i guess they were, they made sure to spank me and ground me for 2 weeks. i was also told that i was a terrible influence on my 9 year old cousin, even though i was 7 and it was his idea.
label: afraid
response: oh that sucks getting blamed for it when it was their fault.

situation: been going through stuff for our move and i just cannot get myself to part with some things. my grandma gave me this sewing machines, it is huge but it meant a lot to her so i just cannot let it go.
dialogue: so we are moving and i am having trouble letting go of a sewing machine my grandma gave me. thinking i should keep it.
do you get much use out of it, or is it just collection dust?
kind of just dust. it meant a lot to her that i have it so i just do not think i can let it go.
label: sentimental
response: i guess you can hang on to it, or maybe there is someone else you both know who can show it some proper lovin'.

situation: one of my friends managed to pay off their first house at the age of 25.
dialogue: one of my friends managed to pay off their first house at the age of 25.
well dang! that is very impressive!
yeah i know, i am really amazed and proud of him. to be honest as proud as i am i cannot help but to be a little jealous too.
label: impressed
response: understandable, i bet the had good budgeting skills and a nice job.

situation: one time i stayed at a friend's house for the weekend. when i got home i discovered that my brothers had destroyed my bedroom
dialogue: i stayed at a friends house for the weekend a while back, and when i got home my bedroom was destroyed
oh no! that is terrible, do you know what happened?
my younger brothers went in my room and messed with all my things. i am so angry about it
label: angry
response: oh no, i am sure they meant no harm, they always say that they are more curious when they are young.

situation: today when i was home alone i was snuggling with a stuffed bunny my ex got me, because i missed him. i feel so pathetic.
dialogue: today when i was home alone i was snuggling with a stuffed bunny my ex got me, because i missed him. i feel so pathetic.
it will pass in time, even though it feels awful right now.
i hope so, i am tired of feeling so miserable. i just wish i had someone here with me right now.
label: lonely
response: aw i am sorry. i remember feeling like that and it was horrible.

situation: saturday was mine and my husband's anniversary. it was just a good day relaxing with the kids and having family time.
dialogue: my husband and i celebrated 9 years saturday. it was such a good day of quality family time.
oh that is great! 9 years together is a long time. you sound happy, i am glad.
yes i love a good day of relaxation and family time
label: content
response: what did y'all do? did you do anything special that evening?

situation: i went to the zoo last month, i have not been since i was a kid. i went to a zoo that was supposed to be one of the top zoos, however i could not help but feel bad for the animals the whole time.
dialogue: i went to the zoo last month, i have not been since i was a kid. i went to a zoo that was supposed to be one of the top zoos, however i could not help but feel bad for the animals the whole time.
oh, i know exactly what you mean. it is not the same as going as a kid.
the enclosures all just seemed so tiny and it felt like none of the animals were able to have any privacy if they wanted it.
label: sad
response: yeah, it is no wonder these animals go crazy on humans sometimes.

situation: one time i won an essay contest. my prize was a free trip to washington d.c.
dialogue: i won an essay contest and i get to go to washington dc for free!
wow! what did you write about?
i wrote about social security reform. kinda boring stuff but it will be fun to visit all the sites in dc
label: excited
response: nice, well i hope you have a nice trip!

situation: we are moving soon and i am so ready for this move. it is going to be a whole new adventure.
dialogue: we are moving. i am so pumped for new adventures.
congrats! that is exciting. is the new place far from your current home?
yes, a new state. i am just imagining all the fun things and new things we can do.
label: anticipating
response: wow, that is really big! i hope you have a stress free move. i know it can be a little stressful, but you seem very excited!

situation: when i was in middle school there was this boy that sat in front of me in 8th, he was always trying to get me to kiss him before class started.
dialogue: when i was in middle school there was this boy that sat in front of me in 8th, he was always trying to get me to kiss him before class started.
wow, really? did you have any feelings for him?

no, the whole thing was really weird and kind of embarrassing really. he sat in the desk in front and would turn around and basically ask me to kiss him in front of the whole class. i only knew him from that class. i usually would just smash my binder in his face instead.
label: annoyed
response: hahaha, that is so cute, i am sure he loved that you teased him like that! i bet your classmates also had a good laugh!

situation: one time i was worried about finding a new job. a person i had worked with before offered me an opportunity to do some work in my field
dialogue: i have been out of a job for a while but someone i know has offered me an opportunity to do some work in my field
wow! what field are you going to be working in?
statistics. i am going to help a real estate company build models to predict house values
label: hopeful
response: dang! i hope you make lots of money!

situation: my friend and i both entered a drawing at the mall for a weekend vacation last month and she won. i have to admit it stings a little that she won and i did not.
dialogue: so a friend and i entered a drawing at the mall and she won. i wish i could say it does not sting a bit that she won.
wow! congrats to her, and i am sorry that you did not get the prize. what did she win?
a weekend trip to gatlinburg. i would of loved that.
label: jealous
response: wow that is a great prize! is she able to take anyone with her or is it just a ticket for one person?

situation: one time i saw a man swallow a sword. it was scary to watch but he turned out fine.
dialogue: i saw  man swallow a sword
wow, were you at a festival?
yes i was. i thought it was pretty intense to watch
label: impressed
response: i have seen that before. i have no idea how they can do that.

situation: i have been so busy packing and getting everything cleaned for our move soon. i like being 10 steps ahead.
dialogue: i have been packing, packing, packing and cleaning.
o that sounds exciting. moving or spring cleaning?
moving, not sure when yet but i like to be  ahead of the game. i hate being rushed.
label: prepared
response: ya last time i moved i was packing for about 6 months. it is smarter to do it a little at a time and get things purged and organized.

situation: someone ran into my car while i was grocery shopping. i came out to a huge dent in my car, i was so mad.
dialogue: someone hit my car while i was shopping. i am so mad they did not even leave a note.
oh no that is terrible, i can not believe that they would drive off without leaving any contact information! how bad was the accident?
huge dent, i cannot believe someone could do that and drive off.
label: furious
response: wow, that is terrible. i hope that you are able to catch them or find surveillance videos of who did it, because most malls do have cameras in the parking lots.

situation: i remember back when i got to pick up my dog at the airport when she was a puppy.
dialogue: i remember back when i got to pick up my dog at the airport when she was a puppy.
aww were you excited when you picked her up?
oh man, i sure was. and she was so excited to get out of that box.
label: excited
response: i bet! what kind of dog is she?

situation: my brother asked to borrow money from me and promised to pay me back. he has trouble with money but i lent it to him anyway
dialogue: my brother is not very good with money but i just lent him some
uh oh, be careful about that, you do not want him becoming dependent on you for handouts.
yeah i do not do that often, but i am certain he will be able to pay me back this time
label: trusting
response: well that is good. i hope it works out for both of you, maybe you could give him some budgeting tips.

situation: some people in this country are just heartless. i watched someone throw their trash at a homeless man today.
dialogue: i just cannot believe some people. i watched this woman throw her trash on a homeless man today.
oh my god, you should have reported her.
i definitely stepped in and made sure this man knew he did not deserve that. just makes me so mad to share a country with people like that.
label: ashamed
response: i am really appalled at people these days.

situation: i am so impatient lately but ready to get some big news and it better be this week.
dialogue: so we are waiting on some news to move. i feel like it will be this week that we find out.
where to?
not sure yet, waiting to find all of that out. i hate waiting though.
label: hopeful
response: me too. well i hope it is to somewhere that you like.

situation: i interviewed for a dream job of mine last week. i found out today that i did not get it.
dialogue: so i interviewed for my dream job last week and i did not get it.
i am sorry to hear that.  hopefully something similar comes along sooner than later.
i really hope so. i was really wanting that job.
label: disappointed
response: just remember to keep your head up and do not give up!

situation: i was driving to work yesterday and a driver beside opened their door at a stop light and threw up everywhere. it was so nasty i almost threw up.
dialogue: so i was driving to work yesterday and the driver next to me opened their door and threw up everywhere.
i do hope they stopped the car at least ! that sounds disgusting, but its better than throwing up in the car right ?
yes they were at a stop light but i was so grossed out after seeing that.
label: disgusted
response: i can imagine when something unexpected like that happens. i do hope they are ok now sorry you had to witness that !

situation: we are moving soon and i am so ready to find out where to. i am ready to plan the move but hard to when you know nothing.
dialogue: i am so ready to find out where we are moving to.
new adventures! i want to go west.
i do not know where i want to go, just want to know where they are sending us
label: anxious
response: i bet you are nervous.

situation: one time i borrowed a book from the library. i left it outside one day and it got rained on.
dialogue: a book i borrowed from the library got rained on and now it is destroyed
oh no. i bet they are going to charge you for a new one.
yeah. i feel pretty bad about it.
label: ashamed
response: maybe they will understand.

situation: one time i found my dog's favorite toy. it brought back memories of when she was a puppy
dialogue: i found my dog's old toy. it brought back memories of when i first got her
aww. i had to put mine down last month. i miss her.
i am sorry to hear that. what kind of dog was she?
label: sentimental
response: border collie. she was great!

situation: i have been looking for a job for a while. i was finally offered one that i think i will like
dialogue: after months of job searching, i finally got a good offer
what kind of job did you get?
i got a job in statistics
label: content
response: what do you do as a statistic

situation: one time i had to take a final for a class. i studied for hours for it and felt very prepared
dialogue: i have a final exam that i have been studying for for days.
how do you think it will go? are you confident?
i think i will do really well. i feel prepared for it.
label: confident
response: what subject is it?

situation: one time i lent my car to a friend. he drove around drunk and totaled it.
dialogue: i stupidly lent my car to a friend.
uh oh. what happened?
he got drunk and took it for a joyride. it did not end well.
label: furious
response: that is horrible! i hope he was okay.

situation: even though i could've gotten more money at another job, i have stayed with my current employer. it is a good place to work.
dialogue: even though i could've gotten more money at another job, i have stayed with my current employer. it is a good place to work.
well that is good to hear i guess. what do you do?
i work in public relations. i create campaigns for companies.
label: faithful
response: what is your most successful campaign so far?

situation: one time i had a job interview that went really well. i was positive that they liked me and were going to hire me.
dialogue: i just had a job interview that went really well. i am expecting a call pretty soon.
that is amazing! what kind of job is it?
it is a statistical analyst job.
label: hopeful
response: i am glad your interview went well, and i really hope you get that call soon!

situation: i recently moved to a new city. i left behind some good friends.
dialogue: i recently moved to a new city. i left behind some good friends.
you can always make new friends, and talk to your old friends at the same time!
that is very true. it will just take some time.
label: sentimental
response: yeah but you never know , you may make life changing friendships so be patient!

situation: last week i was at the grocery store picking up body wash. there were so many to chose from, but i could not help but buy my trusted brand that has served me well for so many years.
dialogue: last week i was at the grocery store picking up body wash. there were so many to chose from, but i could not help but buy my trusted brand that has served me well for so many years.
you gotta stick with what you know sometimes.
yes, why try something new when what you have been using has worked so well.
label: faithful
response: that is right. there is so sense in deviating.

situation: i have so much to do today, but it is raining. i am ok with just staying at home and doing nothing.
dialogue: i have so much to do today, but it is raining. i am ok with just staying at home and doing nothing.
i feel you there, i have a ton of stuff to do, but i cannot get any of it done in this rain.
it sucks. maybe it will be dry this weekend.
label: content
response: i really hope so, i am not sure how much longer i can let my yard grow before it gets too wild.

situation: my dog i had for five years just passed away. he was hit by a car last night.
dialogue: my dog i had for five years just passed away. he was hit by a car last night.
oh i am so sorry. that must be fresh on your heart, may he rest in peace.
it is just so sad to have my loyal companion taken away like that.
label: devastated
response: i can only imagine. i am so sorry. what was his name?

situation: i am ready for hurricane season. i have my kit ready and everything.
dialogue: i am ready for hurricane season. i have my kit ready and everything.
that is great to be prepared. where do you live?
south alabama, near the gulf.
label: prepared
response: oh yeah, you definitely need to be prepared. do you think you will get a hurricane?

situation: i have been sick the last week and my wife has made my chicken broth soup every day!
dialogue: i have been sick the last week and my wife has made my chicken broth soup every day!
wow, see enjoyment.
she is such a blessing to me and spoils me so much.
label: caring
response: you are so lucky. some men pray for that kind of wife

situation: any time i order food, i count on the cook and server to make sure it is handled and cooked appropriately.
dialogue: when i go out to a restaurant, i order gluten free food items.  i have to trust that the cook and server take my request seriously.  if not, my food could be "gluten free" but cross contaminated with foods that are not and still make me ill.
what kind of illness occurs if food is cross contaminated? i am so sorry this happens to you.

if it is mild, just stomach pains for a few days.  if i were to say, eat a bun that was supposed to be gluten free and it was full gluten, my joints also inflame.  so you see it can affect more than just my stomach!
label: trusting
response: you suffer from it more severely than most people i know, this can be devastating to people.

situation: at dinner the other night, my family ordered three diet cokes.  they all came out a different shade from dark to light.  i was pretty concerned with the quality of the drinks when they were delivered.
dialogue: we ordered 3 diet cokes with dinner the other night, and they all came out a different shade of coloring!
wow that is weird.  i love diet coke.  what was wrong with it?
i was concerned they were the wrong drink order, we lined them up and talked to the server and together figured out the syrup bag must be going empty!
label: apprehensive
response: nothing worse than a bad soda!.  i like the new freestyle machines, it is always just right.

situation: cleaning out the closet i often find things that remind me of when all the girls were little.
dialogue: while cleaning out our closets, i always find some old item that reminds me how little the girls used to be.  last time it was a cute pair of jeans in toddler sizing we saved to make "jean purses" out of someday.  my kid is 14 this week!
aww. i understand you. that feeling is priceless.
it definitely triggers some emotions!  then i am torn between keeping it a little longer or finally purging.
label: sentimental
response: it is alright to feel such sentiments buddy

situation: my wife made me pancakes for breakfast. i have a full belly and feel rather happy now.
dialogue: my wife made me pancakes for breakfast. i have a full belly and feel rather happy now.
yum! i love pancakes. is it your favorite food too?
one of my favorite breakfast foods. she also made some thick sliced bacon. she treats me so well.
label: content
response: that is great you have a sweet wife!

situation: i told my brother a secret and i hope he keeps it!
dialogue: i told my brother that i was planning to propose to my best friend, but i hope he keeps it a secret!
that sounds exciting! is he good at keeping secrets?
he lets things slip once in a while, but this is a pretty big secret so i have confidence in him.
label: trusting
response: fingers crossed for you!  i am sure it will be fine.  are you nervous?

situation: my friend is struggling with her business right now, so i am trying to help cheer her on!  it is hard to get through tough times alone, so we are often there for each other.
dialogue: i have a friend who is struggling right now in her business.  i am trying hard to be there to support and cheer her on.
being a business owner is hard. i am sure she is grateful for your help.
right? even if i cannot directly affect her business, i can help keep her spirits up to weather the storm!
label: caring
response: yes, mental and emotional support is the best kind of support.

situation: i saw my neighbor bought the car i have always wanted. i wish i was in a a better financial position to buy one.
dialogue: i saw my neighbor bought the car i have always wanted. i wish i was in a a better financial position to buy one.
what kind of car is it?
subaru brat, best car ever made. its like a car and a t ruck all in one.
label: jealous
response: ooh nice! just start to save, save,save where ever you can and you will get there.

situation: i am in the process of potty training my daughter, but when we go somewhere she still wears diapers. we we at church the other day, and she took her diaper off right in the middle of service. thank goodness, she had on a long dress and i brought extra diapers.
dialogue: i am in the process of potty training my daughter, but when we go somewhere she still wears a diaper. the other day, we were at church and she took her diaper off in the middle of the service.
i remember those potty training days!    i bet you were so embarrassed.
it was not one of our best moments. luckily, she was wearing and long dress and i had extra diapers so we could remedy the situation.
label: embarrassed
response: thank goodness you had extra supplies on hand.   my son was the hardest one out of my 3 kids to potty train.   i feel your pain!

situation: i ordered my son a cool new transformer toy for his birthday. i cannot wait for it to arrive.
dialogue: i ordered a new toy for my son online for his birthday.
oh, did you give it to him yet?
no, not yet. but, i cannot wait to! he is going to have so much fun with it.
label: anticipating
response: that is so cool. i am sure he will love it! where did you get it?

situation: my husband and i are going on our very first cruise in december. i am so excited. i have wanted to go on a cruise for a few years now. its awesome that i will finally be going on one soon.
dialogue: my husband and i are going on our very first cruise in december. i cannot wait!
i love vacations i hope you and him have a good time.
i hope so too. i have wanted to go on a cruise for so long. i am happy were are able to go this year.
label: anticipating
response: what cruise line are you using did they give you a good discount.

situation: my dad called me one day crying out "help me" over and over. when i finally got to his house he had fallen. i took him to the hospital and he had bruised his ribs.
dialogue: my dad called me one day crying out for help. i had to drive over to his house.
oh my goodness! what happened?
he had fallen and bruised his ribs. i had to take him to the hospital.
label: terrified
response: is he okay now?

situation: even though i am a christian and i serve god to the best of my abilities, lately i have kind of been in a rut. at revival last week, the first few nights, people were praising god and giving him worship and just getting caught up in the spirit, but i could not for whatever reason. it really bothered me. i prayed about it, and on the last night, i was finally able to open up and praise and worship too.
dialogue: even though i am a christian and i serve god to the best of my abilities, i have been in a rut lately. last week, during revival, for the first few nights, everyone was praising and participating in worship and just really feeling the spirit, but i could not for whatever reason, and it made me feel bad.
oh, i know what you mean. i have felt that way. best thing to do is pray about it and do not be hard on yourself.

yes, i prayed about it multiple times, and by the last night, i was able to feel the spirit move and i was able to praise and worship too. it felt amazing and it carried over into both services on sunday too.
label: jealous
response: that is amazing! i am so happy your prayers were answered. god knows your heart.

situation: sometimes at night i wake up and eat extremely unhealthy food. i put peanut butter and nutella on chocolate chip cookies.
dialogue: sometimes i wake up at night and eat junk food.
i have never done that but i know plenty of people who do that. its normal every know and again but do not turn it into a daily habit!
yeah but i feel bad afterwards. i like to make peanut butter and nutella sandwiches with chocolate chip cookies.
label: guilty
response: damn that sounds good, honestly its fine every know and again. we all have a sweet tooth.

situation: the other day was my sons birthday party! it was so much fun watching him open all his presents.
dialogue: we had a birthday party for my son the other day!
aw, yay!  how old is he?
he is 6. it was so much fun to watch him open his presents.
label: joyful
response: i love that age!  my niece just turned six and she seems so grown up!

situation: i played volley ball in middle and high school, so we signed my two daughters up to play. when we went to the first practice, the coach said it was her first time coaching, so she asked if i could help some. it was an honor to help coach them, and i enjoyed it because i miss playing.
dialogue: i was the captain of the volley ball team in middle school and high school, so i signed my daughters up to play. since they had an interest in it too. when we got the practice on the first day, the coach said that it was her first year coaching and she asked me if i would help a little.
oh that is awesome, i am sure you were excited to help
i was very excite to help. i miss playing very much, so being able to play with my daughters and show of my skills a little was great.
label: confident
response: thats great, sounds like a fun time. and you got to share time with your daughters which is awesome.

situation: a couple years ago i got hospitalized and diagnosed with ms. the whole experience was terrible.
dialogue: a couple years ago, i was hospitalized and diagnosed with ms.
oh that sucks, have you experienced the symptoms?
yeah, i was blind in my right eye, and my left arm was numb.
label: afraid
response: oh damn that is terrible, i hope it did not affect your life too much.

situation: my friend has been feeling sick a lot lately and i worry about her health.
dialogue: my friend has been sick a lot recently and i am worried about her.
that sucks, hopefully its just something minor. you are a good person for taking care of her
yes.  she has been vomiting and having diarhea a lot
label: caring
response: oh, that sounds bad, probably a stomach virus. those suck!

situation: i was sitting here petting my cat on my lap
dialogue: i am sitting here chilling out with my cat on my lap.
that is great, perfect time to unwind and relax, and earn money!
yes.  my cat is relaxing and always sleeping
label: content
response: awesome, sometimes they can get annoying always running around and nagging you.

situation: i had a job interview
dialogue: i had a job interview last week
how did it go?
i am not sure yet.  i was very nervous
label: apprehensive
response: i would have been nervous too.  when will you find out?

situation: i spent a weekend at a lake house all by myself.  it was incredibly quiet and peaceful and no one bothered me.  i was so happy just to get away from it all and take things slow.
dialogue: i spent a weekend at a lake house all by myself.
oh, i would love time away like that! how did you enjoy it?
it was fantastic.  i found it so restful and peaceful just to get away from it all for a while.
label: content
response: that sounds wonderful! my body is craving something like this. thanks for the inspiration!

situation: i had a few friends over recently. one of my friends brought a guest who puked all over my carpet. it was gross.
dialogue: i had a get together recently, one of my friends brought someone who could not hold their liquor.
oh no, did they do something embarrasing?
heh, well they projectile vomited all over my carpet, it was gross.
label: disgusted
response: that is absolutely disgusting!

situation: when i took my daughter to the skate park she was able to ride up and down a lot of ramps. she was way better than i expected.
dialogue: me and my daughter went to the skate park the other day.
did the two of you have fun?
yeah we did. she can ride up and down the ramps much better than i expected her to.
label: impressed
response: that is awesome. my son has a skateboard but can barely stand up on it.

situation: i have been out of work recently and my father has been helping me pay my bills. i have no way to ever repay him.
dialogue: i have been out of work, and my dads been helping me financially.
i am sorry that you are out of work.  have you had any job interviews? it is good that your father is able to help you during this time.
no, i am filing for disability. theres no way i can ever repay him
label: grateful
response: well, i am glad you will hopefully get some disability income.  it sounds like your dad is not the type who expects to be repayed.  he sounds like a great parent.

situation: i had a meeting with a new doctor this week. i hate meeting new doctors.
dialogue: i had to meet my new physical therapist this week.
did everything work out ok? how did you like them?
they seem ok. i just hate having to meet new doctors.
label: anxious
response: oh, me too. i do not even like to sit in the waiting room.

situation: today was the first day of school for my kids. it is been so quiet here.
dialogue: this is the first time ever that both of my kids have been in school.
interesting, are you feeling ok having less bonding time?
yeah, it is just too quiet.
label: lonely
response: i see, i imagine time will start to fly once you take up a new hobby, or school ends for the day.

situation: i drove 4 hours to hang out with my family on a trip and we spent a total of about 2 hours together over 2 days. i wish i had just stayed home.
dialogue: recently my family had a trip that was very disorganized. basically drove a long way to hang see my family for a handful of hours.
that is not very fun. i hate traveling like that.
same. i wish i had just stayed at home instead of spending all that time on the road.
label: furious
response: at least you got to see your family for a little bit.

situation: i had to wait in line at the store for 15 minutes the other day. there was only one cashier. i was so mad.
dialogue: i had to wait in line at the store the other day for 15 minutes!
ew, that is always the worst. what were you getting?
just some random food stuffs. it would not have been so bad but there was only one cashier.
label: annoyed
response: that is always the case! so annoying. i love the self checkout options. i wish more places had that.

situation: last week we had to go to a funeral. it really hit me hard seeing all my grieving friends.
dialogue: i had to go to my brother in laws funeral last week.
oh no! i am sorry to hear of your loss. are you taking it ok?
i am ok. it just hit me hard seeing all those sad people.
label: sad
response: yeah, funerals are really sad but they can make one appreciate life so much more.

situation: i have some friends who are traveling all over europe
dialogue: i have some friends who are traveling all over europe this summer
wow i would be jealous
i am!  i would love to go myself.
label: jealous
response: same. i have a chance in a few years to go with the family but not 100%.

situation: i recently got together with some old college buddies and we just spend a weekend sitting around talking about the good ole times.
dialogue: my and some old friends from college recently got together. it is always great to see those guys again.
i bet it is! i love getting together with friends, especially if it has been a while.which it seems to be the older i get.
same. and all these guys live in different places now so it is harder and harder to get everyone together.
label: nostalgic
response: i bet it would be tough.  was there a special occasion that brought you all together?

situation: my wife recently spent way more money on clothes than she told me. i wish she would have just told me how much it was. it made it worse to hide it.
dialogue: my wife bought some new clothes and in classic fashion she lied about how much she actually spent.
hahaha, yes we women do not want to get the men angry. but clothes are so expensive these days. we just want to look good for our men.
i know i know. i just wish she could tell me up front. i get more irritated finding out she lied about it.
label: ashamed
response: i guess you can just tell her like you told me just now. maybe she will not be afraid to tell you next time. well maybe,.

situation: i watched a woman being very disrespectful at the mall to another woman of color.
dialogue: this weekend i saw one woman being kind of mean to another woman of color.
yikes, that does not happen too often in today's culture.  did you say anything?
no kidding! i do not see how those kind of people are still around. no. it had already escalated by the time i saw it. we figured it was best to just keep moving.
label: disgusted
response: that might be for the best.  were they arguing about her color or something else?

situation: i have not seen my niece much lately. my sister wanted me to babysit, and i was excited to actually get to see her. but she had to cancel.
dialogue: i do not get to see my only niece too often. i was supposed to babysit her recently, but it fell through. i was kinda sad i did not get to see her.
i am sorry you do not get to see her much. i do not see mine often either. i am sure it did make you sad.
we just do not live super close so it always makes it harder.
label: disappointed
response: yeah, i understand that. i live about 45 minutes from mine and everyone is so busy all the time. maybe you will be able to see her soon.

situation: the last few weeks we have been buying clothes, shoes, and supplies so that my daughters would have everything they needed to go back to school. yesterday was there first day and it went well. i am glad that my planning and buying in advance paid off.
dialogue: the last few weeks have been spent buys school clothes, shoes, and supplies so my girls would be ready to go back to school. there first day was yesterday and it went well.
great! are you home all day or do you just get them off to school and then head to work yourself?
i am home with my toddler, so i drop them off and pick them up. the school is exactly 7 minutes away. i am glad my shopping in advance paid off.
label: prepared
response: for sure! i bet it was nice to have the hosue a little more quiet too.

situation: i had to wait a few weeks to get some results back from a test at the doctor's office.
dialogue: recently had some test run at the doctors office and it took a few weeks to get the results back.
oh that must have been torture! is everything alright?
yes fortunately everything turned out ok. but it was nerve wracking waiting on the answer.
label: anxious
response: i can imagine. glad you are ok though!

situation: my husband's grandfather just passed away recently, and his three sons are acting very childish and selfish about everything concerning the will. they even had arguments about who was getting what, in front of him, while he was still alive. the whole thing makes me so angry.
dialogue: my husband's grandfather recently passed away, and his three sons are acting very childish and selfish about everything concerning the will.
oh no! that is no bueno. usually the person that wants the least deserves the most. that is sad

it really is. the worst part is that they had arguments in front of him, while he was sick, about who should get what. i wish they would have spent that time just loving and comforting him. that is what my husband and i tried to do.
label: furious
response: oh that is awful and borderline abusive

situation: watching my two daughters playing volley ball with their team makes me remember all the games i played in with my friends. i miss playing very much, but i have great memories.
dialogue: watching my daughters play volley ball with their team makes me remember all the games i played in with my friends.
ah, you must have great memories than
the memories are awesome and i miss playing.but i would not trade the life i live now to go back,
label: nostalgic
response: you know today's events are tomorrow's memories

situation: i am going fishing at my favorite spot tomorrow. i know i am going to catch something!
dialogue: i am going fishing at my favorite spot tomorrow. i know i am going to catch something!
cool! what kind of fish do you expect to catch there?
blue catfish, they get so huge. i have a secret recipe for stink bait that works well!
label: confident
response: yum! invite me over for some fish dinner sometime, will not you?

situation: i am going to play in a dominos tournament
dialogue: i am going to play dominos tonight
that sounds like fun!  is it with friends?
well with some locals at the local brewpub
label: confident
response: so cool, i hope it goes well

situation: my family came to visit me recently. i always get nervous before having visitors.
dialogue: my family came to visit recently, i always get so nervous about people visiting.
that is
i have to make sure the house is clean and that everything is in order before they arrive, nerve wracking!
label: anxious
response: that is so nice when family visits. it is so much fun! but yeah, it is a lot of work for sure.

situation: i have a birthday coming up. i really hop i get the gift i am asking for.
dialogue: i have a birthday coming up. i really hop i get the gift i am asking for.
oh, happy early birthday! what is it that you are hoping for?
thank you, i am hoping for a new camera. it is about time to upgrade.
label: anticipating
response: nice! i hope you get it! cameras are such a wonderful tool to have these days and there are so many cool options to choose from.

situation: my dog go into the trash can and drug it all over the house. i am so mad right now!
dialogue: my dog go into the trash can and drug it all over the house. i am so mad right now!
oh jeez! what a mess.
i know, it is going to take me all evening to clean up!
label: furious
response: i like dogs but that is why i do not have one

situation: i am going camping this weekend. i got my tent, sleeping bag and tons of food. i think i have everything i need!
dialogue: i am going camping this weekend. i got my tent, sleeping bag and tons of food. i think i have everything i need!
excellent! stay hydrated!
oh i will, i am ready for whatever the elements throw at me!
label: prepared
response: sounds like fun!

situation: i once woke up in the middle of the night to a weird sound, i grabbed my gun and ran for the door, it was actually the printer.
dialogue: the other night i heard a sound like someone was breaking in my house, i was pretty scared.
wow, that sounds quite disturbing. was someone breaking in?
